Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

programme.title: Faites sauter la banque
Napad na bank
Faites sauter la banque!
programme.desc: Faites sauter la banque!: Directed by Jean Girault. With Louis de Funès, Yvonne Clech, Jean-Pierre Marielle, Anne Doat. A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057051/","name":"Faites sauter la banque!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjE1NDM2YzUtMjY1OC00NTdkLTg3MWYtOTk2Y2RiMWQ3N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTgxOTIzNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"languedoc-586-836028"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant (changed my rating from 8 to 9 upon second viewing)!","reviewBody":"This is a surrealistic comedy, and it doesn't matter that its plot and situational developments are far-fetched. The director here is Jean Girault, who did some of the best De Funès films (and in particular some of the best from the Gendarme series). Fast-paced, brilliantly acted, hilarious... The banker from the start is guilty of insider trading BTW (which the Storyline here does not mention). This is necessary to make us sympathize at least basically with De Funès in his criminal undertaking to right wrong-doing, with the unlikely complicity of his incredible family. All terrific actors BTW.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2071,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1964-02-25","keywords":"tunneling,spoof,bank heist,stock fraud,tough girl","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000086/","name":"Louis de Funès"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0165915/","name":"Yvonne Clech"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0547339/","name":"Jean-Pierre Marielle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032877/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010669/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897505/","name":"Jacques Vilfrid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764583/","name":"Louis Sapin"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rodzina
The Family
programme.desc: Houria (Consolate Siperius) z mężem i córką zatrzymują się w domu krewnej w Europie. Czekają na informację z urzędu imigracyjnego. Gospodyni traktuje gości życzliwie. Z czasem pojawiają się problemy.

programme.title: Niepospolita
programme.desc: Rok 1939. Pisarz Tadeusz Dołęga-Mostowicz (Patryk Szwichtenberg) podróżuje po Polsce ze swoją asystentką Dianą (Agata Różycka). Przeprowadza wywiady z ludźmi, którzy osiągnęli sukces w różnych dziedzinach. Na swojej drodze spotyka m.in. Melchiora Wańkowicza (Marek Karpowicz), Janusza Kusocińskiego, Eugeniusza Kwiatkowskiego i Hankę Ordonównę.

programme.title: Callas i Pasolini - historia miłości niemożliwej
programme.desc: Opowieść o współpracy i życiu osobistym dwojga słynnych twórców. Rok 1969. Pier Paolo Pasolini realizuje film, którego fabuła osnuta jest wokół losów Medei. Odtwórczynią roli głównej jest Maria Callas. Wydarzenie to staje się punktem wyjścia do przedstawienia relacji kontrowersyjnego reżysera z największą diwą operową tamtych czasów. Opowiedzą o tym m.in. współtwórcy pamiętnego filmu.

programme.title: Le couperet
Ostre cięcia
Le Couperet
programme.desc: Le couperet: Directed by Costa-Gavras. With José Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Couturiau, Christa Théret. A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0422015/","name":"Le couperet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDAzNjYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTIzMDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0422015/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Angeneer"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A frightening reality","reviewBody":"People who characterize this film as a comedy obviously haven't got it. The comic element is just a thin surface. This is a tragic story and a very strong political statement. Obviously Bruno's decisions and actions are absurd, but his circumstances are not. The movie offers an incisive look at the dark reality of chronic unemployment. Corporate greed leads to story after story after story of desperation. Westlake and Gavras know that in order to pass the message you have to lighten up the atmosphere (a la Truman Show), or else the viewer won't sit the whole movie. In order to appreciate the film you have to marginalize the main plot element (the murder story) and concentrate on all the subplots.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7855,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"employment recruiter,competition,outsourcing,contestant elimination,unemployment","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1542634521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305296/","name":"José Garcia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0895759/","name":"Karin Viard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597967/","name":"Geordy Couturiau"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002020/","name":"Costa-Gavras"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922799/","name":"Donald E. The movie offers an incisive look at the dark reality of chronic unemployment. Corporate greed leads to story after story after story of desperation. Westlake and Gavras know that in order to pass the message you have to lighten up the atmosphere (a la Truman Show), or else the viewer won't sit the whole movie. In order to appreciate the film you have to marginalize the main plot element (the murder story) and concentrate on all the subplots.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7855,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"employment recruiter,competition,outsourcing,contestant elimination,unemployment","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1542634521","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305296/","name":"José Garcia","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0895759/","name":"Karin Viard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597967/","name":"Geordy Couturiau"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002020/","name":"Costa-Gavras"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922799/","name":"Donald E. programme.title: Exposed
Objawienie
Exposed
programme.desc:
Exposed: Directed by Gee Malik Linton. With Ana de Armas, Gabe Vargas, Sandy Tejada, Ariel Pacheco. A police detective investigates the truth behind his partner's death. The mysterious case reveals disturbing police corruption and a dangerous secret involving an unlikely young woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4019560/","name":"Exposed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMzk1MDI1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDYxODkzNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police detective investigates the truth behind his partner's death. The mysterious case reveals disturbing police corruption and a dangerous secret involving an unlikely young woman.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4019560/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MT-15087"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"The studio failed – this is NOT a horrible movie","reviewBody":"However, the marketing certainly is. It's not as exclusively idiotic as in the case of Cormac McCarthy/Ridley Scott's very formidable "The Counselor" (what you should know about that picture is that it's not a plot-driven thriller about trafficking, but an existential drama so gloomy that "Se7en" seems to be offering more hope in comparison and now look at its poster), but the poster and the plot summary for this one produced by the studio and featured on IMDb are obviously misleading as well (even after the studio did its totally uncalled for re-editing of the material) and create false expectations. Hence – disappointed viewers and the abysmal rating.

So what else "Exposed" is NOT: 


* This is not a movie starring Keanu Reeves. In fact, Reeves' character plays a very insignificant role in the developments. But unlike Emily Blunt's virtually 'non-existing' lead in "Sicario" that ultimately ruins that otherwise interesting and well-directed flick, it doesn't ruin anything here, because this movie more or less manages to get through the studio's irrational indeed interference and somehow remains centered around a female protagonist played by Ana de Armas. And Reeves should have been credited in the same way as Mira Sorvino is – "and Keanu Reeves".



* This movie is not an action thriller either. Police work and corrupt cops are present but seen from a different angle.


What is "Exposed" then? Despite all the carnage caused by the studio's decisions, it's still a legit psychological drama with half of its dialogue in Spanish, which structure resembles those another Spanish speaker Borges found fascinating in many Chesterton's stories – we have two explanations: a supernatural one and a realistic one. While all the story lines are not perfectly pulled together – again, probably thanks to precious alterations introduced by the "suits" – overall, the writing is competent. So is the directing. The acting could have been better at times, but it doesn't affect the movie in any critical way. All in all, it's a quite decent one – slightly above average.

If I'm not mistaken, Terry Gilliam said that after a nuclear disaster there will be two surviving species: cockroaches and studio executives. Well long live Cockroaches!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14663,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-01-22","keywords":"police detective,police partner,soldier,deception,female protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exposed","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2480912921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTRkZDJiYmUtODgxNy00NTQwLWJlZjItZmFiYmQ1OTA0YTQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTRkZDJiYmUtODgxNy00NTQwLWJlZjItZmFiYmQ1OTA0YTQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Exposed"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1869101/","name":"Ana de Armas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000206/","name":"Keanu Reeves"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001520/","name":"Christopher McDonald"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1768304/","name":"Gee Malik Linton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097671/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465798/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1768304/","name":"Gee Malik Linton"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Play
programme.desc: Mężczyzna nie radzi sobie z poczuciem winy. Prześladuje go wspomnienie, że jako dziecko nie potrafił obronić swojej matki. Stara się stawić czoło traumie. Gęsty, wielopoziomowy, przepełniony emocjami film Piotra Sułkowskiego z głównymi rolami cenionych polskich aktorów Adama Woronowicza i Joanny Kulig.

credits.actor: Joanna Kulig

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

programme.desc: Młoda ucieka z domu. Podróżuje autostopem. Poznaje niezrównoważonego dziwaka Chudego. Pod osłoną nocy snują się po mieście, docierają w coraz dziwniejsze rejony, doświadczając niezwykłych emocji.

programme.title: Submergence

Submergence
programme.desc:
Submergence: Directed by Wim Wenders. With Alicia Vikander, Celyn Jones, Jannik Schümann, Jean-Pierre Lorit. James and Danielle meet on vacation and fall in love. She's going to the dark North Atlantic bottom to find life. He's going to Somalia to find a terrorist but gets a dark cell." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3563262/","name":"Submergence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE2NDUyMTY3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODU0MDQ5NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"James and Danielle meet on vacation and fall in love. She's going to the dark North Atlantic bottom to find life. He's going to Somalia to find a terrorist but gets a dark cell.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3563262/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"celinedecarr"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A big pile of meh","reviewBody":"This movie could have worked, and in some ways it really does. Though some people don't agree, I found the chemistry between Vikander and McAvoy to be good and very believable.

What wasn't at all believable was the script. Oh looordy, lord, there's some bad lines in there. Everything drowned in pointless talks about the ocean and suuuure it's an analogy and all, but yeezus give it a rest, will ya? The story isn't really there. It could have been an epic love story, but it's not - though that's not the actor's fault. Vikander and McAvoy give it everything they have to deliver those at times painful lines.

If you love everything else Vikander has done, you'll probably like this one as well. The male gaze is all over her, and it truly works.

The cinematography for this film is absolutely spectacular and almost worth the time just because of that (almost).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8002,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-04-06","keywords":"terrorism,life philosophy,origins of life,spy,separation of lovers","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3678124057","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUzYjlhMWMtMmYwNC00YWM4LTgyZjAtZjc3YWE3MDE3ZmZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUzYjlhMWMtMmYwNC00YWM4LTgyZjAtZjc3YWE3MDE3ZmZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Submergence' is a love story that takes us into the extremely different worlds of our two protagonists, Danielle Flinders (Alicia Vikander) and James More (James McAvoy). They meet by chance in a remote hotel in Normandy where they both prepare for a dangerous mission. They fall in love almost against their will, but soon recognize in each other the love of their lives. When they have to separate, we find out that James works for the British Secret Service. He's involved in a mission in Somalia to track down a source for suicide bombers infiltrating Europe. Danielle 'Danny' Flinders is a bio-mathematician working on a deep sea diving project to support her theory about the origin of life on our planet. Soon, they are worlds apart. James is taken hostage by Jihadist fighters and has no way of contacting Danny, and she has to go down to the bottom of the ocean in her submersible, not even knowing if James is still alive ..."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427714/","name":"Celyn Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2583479/","name":"Jannik Schümann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000694/","name":"Wim Wenders"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109131/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0525323/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221144/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0226586/","name":"Erin Dignam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6320077/","name":"J.M. Ledgard"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Divide and Conquer: The Story of Roger Ailes
Kariera i upadek Rogera Ailesa
Divide and Conquer: The Story of Roger Ailes
programme.desc: Divide and Conquer: The Story of Roger Ailes: Directed by Alexis Bloom. With Tony Waag, Babette Bombshell, Catherine Corcoran, John Reardon. A documentary that explores the rise and fall of the late Roger Ailes, from his early media influence on the Nixon presidency to his controversial leadership at Fox News." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6471628/","name":"Divide and Conquer: The Story of Roger Ailes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NzczMjQwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAxNDE3NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A documentary that explores the rise and fall of the late Roger Ailes, from his early media influence on the Nixon presidency to his controversial leadership at Fox News.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6471628/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"torbi-2"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shining a light on the puppet master of Fox News.","reviewBody":"This was really well done. We all know the stories of how Ailes was taken down for harassment, but this doc shined a light on his notable (if somewhat horrific) contributions to media as we know it now. I was surprised to learn that his first cable channel eventually became MSNBC (which most likely pushed him to further extremism) and that he bought up a small town paper in his town for reasons that are slightly unclear here. I would have liked to have learned more about the other ex-wives (and the "assistant" who seems to fall off the radar once Ailes marries his third and final wife.... Liz stood by her man until the bitter end). I feel sorry for these strong shouty newswomen who continue to be used by Fox News but hopefully the climate of harassment has changed to allow them a safe workspace. I believe in their right to say it, but not how they say it. (also magical is the fact that "gender queer monster drag" actor Babette Bombshell portrayed Ailes in reenactments.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":537,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2018-12-07","keywords":"fall","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2297936409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNjNjE0ZTEtMDI5Ny00MWI5LThlNWYtNmE1M2QxOTIyZTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNjNjE0ZTEtMDI5Ny00MWI5LThlNWYtNmE1M2QxOTIyZTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A documentary that explores the rise and fall of the late Roger Ailes from his early media influence on the Nixon presidency to his controversial leadership at Fox News."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1719871/","name":"Tony Waag"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2219800/","name":"Babette Bombshell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3313554/","name":"Catherine Corcoran"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1946954/","name":"Alexis Bloom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152564/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0635686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242489/"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Parlez-moi de la pluie
Opowiedz mi o deszczu
Parlez-moi de la pluie
programme.desc:
Parlez-moi de la pluie: Directed by Agnès Jaoui. With Agnès Jaoui, Jean-Pierre Bacri, Jamel Debbouze, Pascale Arbillot. Agnes Jaoui plays a local political candidate Agathe Villanova, who returns to her childhood home in the south of France in order to help her sister Florence (Pascale Arbillot) sort through their recently deceased mother's belongings. While she's there, the son (Jamel Debbouze as Karim) of family maid (Mimouna Hadji) takes advantage of her presence and attempts to interview her as part of a documentary about successful women that he's undertaken with his film school teacher, Michel (co-writer Jean-Pierre Bacri). However, Michel's intentions aren't quite what they seem, as he's having an affair with Florence and hoping to persuade her to leave her husband. Meanwhile, Karim finds his own marriage threatened when his attractive hotel co-worker (Florence Loiret-Caille) declares an interest in him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1065332/","name":"Parlez-moi de la pluie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTI2MzkwNzY4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTkxMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agnes Jaoui plays a local political candidate Agathe Villanova, who returns to her childhood home in the south of France in order to help her sister Florence (Pascale Arbillot) sort through their recently deceased mother's belongings","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1065332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stensson"},"dateCreated":"2009-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Talking","reviewBody":"The French are good at it. These conversation movies, there most of the action comes from the talking and there the people only exist through that.

Here we meet the high-heeled Parisian feminist, who according to the rules she keeps, has decided to have a boyfriend, decided to live alone, decided to have no children. A success story, worth a documentary to the old humbug disillusioned film-maker and the younger and more idealistic Karim of Arabian origin. By the way, Karim's mother works as a maiden in the household of the high-heeled feminist's sister.

This is funny and intelligent and not sensational. You won't remember it, but in some ways, you won't forget it either.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1795,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-09-17","keywords":"interview,f rated,life crisis,film shooting,documentarian","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Parlez-moi de la pluie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425330457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMzEwNDgxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjEyMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMzEwNDgxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjEyMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-centered, workaholic feminist politician grudgingly agrees to take part in a documentary on the subject of Â“successful women.""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045870/","name":"Jean-Pierre Bacri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069279/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045870/","name":"Jean-Pierre Bacri"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mythica: The Darkspore
Garderobiany
The Dresser
programme.desc:
Mythica: The Darkspore: Directed by Anne K. Black. With Melanie Stone, Adam Johnson, Jake Stormoen, Nicola Posener. Marek and her company must go on a journey and prevent Szorlok from obtaining all the shards of the Darkspore, or all will be lost." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3478232/","name":"Mythica: The Darkspore","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ1NDI0Nzg4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc4ODA2NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Marek and her company must go on a journey and prevent Szorlok from obtaining all the shards of the Darkspore, or all will be lost.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3478232/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pangianreg"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gimme a break...","reviewBody":"Keep the costume designer and the photographer, fire all others, including the director.

Poor - no, I take it back - awful script and dialogues and terrible, terrible directing. There is no real coherence from one scene to the next, no one takes advantage of the actors' strong points, long scenes to fill the time in order to give an excuse for a movie.

This could have been so much more.

CG were not needed really; we could have used our imagination, with a bit of air acting, and use the money to hire a better director.

And the story - oh, the story - what a mess... It really peaks in the end where, disposing of the whole of the point, the heroes mess up their mission, utterly fail, leaving the world to its doom and walk away all smiles in search for another adventure and... warmer climates.

Really, now, whoever gave high marks to this film must either be a close friend of someone in the cast or crew or an utter nutter about anything sword-yielding, magic-casting or horse-riding.

And... "Hercules" must have been stoned up to his eyeballs.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5623,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2015-06-19","keywords":"sword and sorcery,magical object,sword fight,cave,treasure map","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mythica: The Darkspore","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2450830617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjZWQ4ZDgtOWJlNC00MWE2LWEzZTAtZTFhZDNjMzkwNGVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjZWQ4ZDgtOWJlNC00MWE2LWEzZTAtZTFhZDNjMzkwNGVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Mythica: The Darkspore"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5752523/","name":"Melanie Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424453/","name":"Adam Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3940484/","name":"Jake Stormoen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1237224/","name":"Anne K. programme.title: Frailty
Ręka Boga
Frailty
programme.desc: Frailty: Directed by Bill Paxton. With Bill Paxton, Matthew McConaughey, Powers Boothe, Matt O'Leary. A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0264616/","name":"Frailty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIxNTE2MTY1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODYyMTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0264616/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"michaelRokeefe"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not your typical God fearing man.","reviewBody":"A very promising directorial debut for Bill Paxton. A very dark thriller/who-really-done-it recommended by Stephen King. This is a strong, well-conceived horror tale about a devout, but demented man in Thurman, Texas that goes on a murdering spree after getting orders from God to eliminate demons trying to control mankind. A couple of plot twists and an eerie finale makes for your moneys worth. Most of the violence you don't really see, but still enough to double up your stomach.\n\nDirector Paxton plays the twisted man to be known as the Hand of God Killer. Matthew McConaughey is equally impressive as the demented man's eldest son that ends up telling this story to a Dallas FBI Agent(Powers Boothe). Boothe, as always, is solid and flawless. Suspenseful white knuckler! Highly recommended.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80594,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-04-12","keywords":"fbi agent,demon,religious fanatic,rose garden,plot twist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000959/","name":"Powers Boothe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057460/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020377/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018947/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360062/","name":"Brent Hanley"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gohatto
Tabu
Gohatto
programme.desc:
Gohatto: Directed by Nagisa Ôshima. With Takeshi Kitano, Ryûhei Matsuda, Shinji Takeda, Tadanobu Asano. The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0213682/","name":"Gohatto","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyMzBkZjAtNDEyYi00ZDY1LTkyZWItNjQwYmZhNjQ5MDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0213682/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chi_na_hime_chan"},"dateCreated":"2003-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing and thought provoking...","reviewBody":"Even after seeing this movie more than 20 times it still draws me in. Some of the best actors in Japan take part in this flim, most noticeable is Beat Takeshi. The story line is simply jaw dropping. This is the type of film that Hollywood probably wouldn't even dare make. To me the subject matter isn't shocking, but I've spent time in Japan and studied their language and culture extensively, but some people are offended by this. Simply because they cannot get past the little detail that these strong, powerful men can have gay tendencies.

The movie follows Kano Sozaburo as he joins the Shinshigumi (feudal era police). (Also not here that most of the main characters, except Kano and Tashiro are based off actual historical/famous people.) As Kano joins the rank, his beauty and sword skill captivate the men around him, from the other new recruit to the top ranking officers. Suddenly people begin to die, murdered in the night. Any more will give away the story.

IF you get the chance to see this movie do. For some it may be hard to get all the details and understand the little intricacies involved, and the ending may confuse some (especially if you are just going off what the subtitles say). But give it a chance, it's a wonderful film, but not for everyone (and not for the whole family ;)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7419,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-12-18","keywords":"19th century,samurai,japan,rivalry,prostitute","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001429/","name":"Takeshi Kitano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559430/","name":"Ryûhei Matsuda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847487/","name":"Shinji Takeda"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007001/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060607/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0793050/","name":"Ryôtarô Shiba"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Bigger Splash
Nienasyceni
A Bigger Splash
programme.desc:
A Bigger Splash: Directed by Luca Guadagnino. With Tilda Swinton, Matthias Schoenaerts, Ralph Fiennes, Dakota Johnson. The vacation of a famous rock star and her boyfriend in Italy is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2056771/","name":"A Bigger Splash","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxNzk3NzMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc3ODQ4NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The vacation of a famous rock star and her boyfriend in Italy is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2056771/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colinlomasox"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A masterclass in character development","reviewBody":"World famous singer Marianne Lane (Swinton), temporarily mute from a recent throat operation, is enjoying a relaxing holiday with her doting film-maker boyfriend Paul De Smedt (Schoenaerts) on a remote idyllic Italian island. Much to their initial annoyance, Lane's manic music producer and ex-boyfriend Harry Hawkes (Fiennes) turns up with his newly discovered daughter Penelope (Johnson) to gate- crash the tranquillity.

A Bigger Splash is a character development masterclass by Guadagnino. Over the first hour, the film gives everything to build up the intricacies of each character's attributes so that every subsequent variation and elaboration feels exhilarating. This is a film about people and relationships; how different associations can sometimes coalesce yet at other times grate, how secrets and history must awkwardly co-exist with the fantasies of perfection.

Fiennes is simply superb. He absolutely nails Hawkes extrovert nature, perfectly mixing it with the selfish dark underbelly which success invariably requires. Swinton marvellously continues to build her rapidly emerging reputation with a multifaceted character that says less than a hundred words throughout the entire running time. Both Schoenaerts and Johnson are solid but are unluckily eclipsed by Fiennes and Swinton's sparkle. In fact, such is Fiennes utter dominance early on, there feels a distinct possibility he will overshadow not only the other actors, but the film itself. Fortunately, as time passes the rest of the cast get their chance in the sun and, to their credit, pull it back just before it becomes the Ralph Fiennes Show.

The friction between De Smedt and Hawkes is always at the forefront; the protective grounded boyfriend against the vociferous music producer ex. Hawkes tempts Lane to speak at the dinner table, De Smedt knocks him back, Hawkes dances to a track he produced for the Rolling Stones, De Smedt pulls Lane closer on the sofa. It's the subtle fragments of both loving and sexual tension which keep the flow of A Bigger Splash so thrilling.

When the plot eventually makes its move, sides are taken, suspicions are rife, relationships are both strained and solidified. Only then do you realise just how well the film has branded its characters into your hide, and how desperate you are to know the outcome.

Until the last half hour or so not much really happens in A Bigger Splash but you simply don't notice, such is the utter delight in watching a great cast develop complex characters with a wonderfully astute script.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":28784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-11-26","keywords":"female frontal nudity,pubic hair,male objectification,skinny dipping,obnoxious visitor","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2446505241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzNTA0NDUxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQzMjk5NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzNTA0NDUxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQzMjk5NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The vacation of a famous rock star and a filmmaker is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0774386/","name":"Matthias Schoenaerts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0345174/","name":"Luca Guadagnino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0432917/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0547673/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1738734/","name":"David Kajganich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0220227/","name":"Jacques Deray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0656098/","name":"Alain Page"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2056771, Title: A Bigger Splash, --- Description: A Bigger Splash: Directed by Luca Guadagnino. With Tilda Swinton, Matthias Schoenaerts, Ralph Fiennes, Dakota Johnson. The vacation of a famous rock star and her boyfriend in Italy is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2056771/","name":"A Bigger Splash","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxNzk3NzMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc3ODQ4NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The vacation of a famous rock star and her boyfriend in Italy is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2056771/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"colinlomasox","dateCreated":"2016-03-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A masterclass in character development","reviewBody":"World famous singer Marianne Lane (Swinton), temporarily mute from a recent throat operation, is enjoying a relaxing holiday with her doting film-maker boyfriend Paul De Smedt (Schoenaerts) on a remote idyllic Italian island. Much to their initial annoyance, Lane's manic music producer and ex-boyfriend Harry Hawkes (Fiennes) turns up with his newly discovered daughter Penelope (Johnson) to gate- crash the tranquillity.

A Bigger Splash is a character development masterclass by Guadagnino. Over the first hour, the film gives everything to build up the intricacies of each character's attributes so that every subsequent variation and elaboration feels exhilarating. This is a film about people and relationships; how different associations can sometimes coalesce yet at other times grate, how secrets and history must awkwardly co-exist with the fantasies of perfection.

Fiennes is simply superb. He absolutely nails Hawkes extrovert nature, perfectly mixing it with the selfish dark underbelly which success invariably requires. Swinton marvellously continues to build her rapidly emerging reputation with a multifaceted character that says less than a hundred words throughout the entire running time. Both Schoenaerts and Johnson are solid but are unluckily eclipsed by Fiennes and Swinton's sparkle. In fact, such is Fiennes utter dominance early on, there feels a distinct possibility he will overshadow not only the other actors, but the film itself. Fortunately, as time passes the rest of the cast get their chance in the sun and, to their credit, pull it back just before it becomes the Ralph Fiennes Show.

The friction between De Smedt and Hawkes is always at the forefront; the protective grounded boyfriend against the vociferous music producer ex. Hawkes tempts Lane to speak at the dinner table, De Smedt knocks him back, Hawkes dances to a track he produced for the Rolling Stones, De Smedt pulls Lane closer on the sofa. It's the subtle fragments of both loving and sexual tension which keep the flow of A Bigger Splash so thrilling.

When the plot eventually makes its move, sides are taken, suspicions are rife, relationships are both strained and solidified. Only then do you realise just how well the film has branded its characters into your hide, and how desperate you are to know the outcome.

Until the last half hour or so not much really happens in A Bigger Splash but you simply don't notice, such is the utter delight in watching a great cast develop complex characters with a wonderfully astute script.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":28784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-11-26","keywords":"female frontal nudity,pubic hair,male objectification,skinny dipping,obnoxious visitor","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2446505241","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzNTA0NDUxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQzMjk5NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzNTA0NDUxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQzMjk5NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The vacation of a famous rock star and a filmmaker is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.
","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0774386/","name":"Matthias Schoenaerts","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0345174/","name":"Luca Guadagnino"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0432917/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0547673/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1738734/","name":"David Kajganich","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0220227/","name":"Jacques Deray","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0656098/","name":"Alain Page"],"duration":"PT2H5M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz: Directed by Kieran Parker. With Bryan Larkin, Iván Kamarás, Velibor Topic, Laurentiu Possa. In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruthless and notorious of all military special forces: the Russian Spetsnaz." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2241403/","name":"Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NzAwODEwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTMwNTQ2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this third installment of the hit Nazi Zombie action horror movie, Outpost: Rise Of The Spetnaz, we discover the horrifying origins of these supernatural soldiers and see them in ferocious gladiatorial battle against the most ruth","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2241403/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tekoppar"},"dateCreated":"2018-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just a bad movie","reviewBody":"I just rewatched the first one and the second one but had never heard about this one so I decided to watch it. While the first movie is a decent low budget horror movie, the second one is an action/horror movie and this one. This one is a pure russian wank fantasy that has nothing to do with the first movies. So if you enjoyed the first one and kinda liked the second one but wanted more? Well this movie contains nothing about what you liked from the first two, so just ignore this one. If they had called this movie just Rise of the Spetsnaz instead of Outpost and removed the whole "zombie" element it might have been a decent low budget war movie. But as it stands I'm judging the movie as a trilogy and as such it's an awful one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2258,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-06-27","keywords":"zombie,underground facility,escape,prisoner,ss officer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1385922/","name":"Bryan Larkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436442/","name":"Iván Kamarás"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867677/","name":"Velibor Topic"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0662404/","name":"Kieran Parker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197375/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0428412/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2361978/","name":"Rae Brunton"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Przymierze 2: Magowie
programme.desc: Uczniowie John, Marcus i Matt to wielcy nieudacznicy. Nie radzą sobie z nauką, są przedmiotem żartów ze strony kolegów, nie udaje im się poderwać atrakcyjnych dziewczyn. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy w szkole pojawia się nowy uczeń, tajemniczy Luc. Twierdzi, że mogą stać się najpopularniejszymi osobami w szkole, muszą jednak odprawić magiczne rytuały. John uświadamia sobie, że tym na czym naprawdę zależy Lucowi, są ich dusze.

programme.title: Operation Dunkirk
Operacja Dunkierka
Operation Dunkirk
programme.desc: Operation Dunkirk: Directed by Nick Lyon. With Ifan Meredith, Kimberley Hews, Darren Hill, Kyle Hotz. A band of soldiers must battle their way through Nazi territory to rescue a scientist that could help turn the tide of WWII." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6836772/","name":"Operation Dunkirk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUxMDZjYTgtM2Q0MS00ZTRiLThkYzktNDQ3ZGMzMjY0ZjIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A band of soldiers must battle their way through Nazi territory to rescue a scientist that could help turn the tide of WWII.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6836772/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mirgvolsung"},"dateCreated":"2017-08-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horribly inaccurate","reviewBody":"The premise of the film is that a squad of BEF soldiers are sent back into Nazi occupied France instead of evacuating at Dunkirk. This sets the movie in 1940. In one early scene, the BEF squad are riding in a Jeep with a white star on the hood indicating it's an American vehicle, also Jeeps weren't built until 1941. Which is the year after this film takes place. The villain in the film wears the insignia of a Private in the SS but is wearing a Naval jacket. This same Nazi also continuously switches between speaking German and English to every one, including the Germans under his command. With all that said, the "package" they are sent to retrieve is a lady who knows how to make Radar. The movie is in 1940 remember; Radar was invented in 1933. Did any one research anything pertaining to this film? The movie is just bad. A waste of the $5 I spent at Walmart!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3808,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","History","War"],"datePublished":"2017-08-29","keywords":"historically inaccurate,frenchwoman,mockbuster,dunkirk france,nazi","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580583/","name":"Ifan Meredith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2165604/","name":"Kimberley Hews"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3283544/","name":"Darren Hill"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528963/","name":"Nick Lyon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0389394/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0576015/","name":"Geoff Meed"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3762687/","name":"Stephen Meier"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Moonlighting
Fucha
Moonlighting
programme.desc: Moonlighting: Directed by Jerzy Skolimowski. With Jeremy Irons, Eugene Lipinski, Jirí Stanislav, Eugeniusz Haczkiewicz. A Polish contractor, Nowak, leads a group of workmen to London so they can provide cheap labor for a government official based there. Nowak (Irons) has to manage the project and the men as they encounter the tempations of the West and loneliness and separation from their families. Nowak is the only one of the group who speaks English, and he uses this as a tool over his team. When the unrest in Poland leads to a military takeover, Nowak is faced with a much more difficult situation than he expected." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084354/","name":"Moonlighting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Y0M2I3ZWItYTRjZi00YTAyLTliYWQtZGM3YzhiMDBmY2NiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIyNzY1NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Polish contractor, Nowak, leads a group of workmen to London so they can provide cheap labor for a government official based there. Nowak (Irons) has to manage the project and the men as they encounter the tempations of the West an","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084354/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FilmCriticLalitRao"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moonlighting (1982), a great Polish film directed by Jerzy Skolimowski.","reviewBody":"Moonlighting is an outstanding Polish film which deserves to be listed among top 100 world cinema films.It is a film which shows us that there are some cruel,inhuman,unjust political systems and political establishments who constantly deprive common people of earning their respective livelihoods.Moonlighting demonstrates that human life is full of misery as it can make somebody do things which one would normally not do in daily life.This is the case of a Polish foreman Novak who is in London with three construction workers known to him. For them,their work site appears more of a prison as they cannot go out.Skolimowski is as critical of the plight of clandestine workers as that of Polish government's decision to declare Martial Law.It is sad to learn that according to moonlighting some workers had to work for 18 hours a day.Anxiety,apprehension and confusion are immediately palpable to these people who have landed in London for earning extra money.For example :an airport scene shows Polish workers to be entirely dependent on Novak as he is the only person who speaks English.Touching too are the scenes in which Novak pilfers from a neighborhood supermarket.A word about Sir Jeremy Irons.He is a joy to watch as nobody expected him to play the role of Nowak with amazing inventiveness.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama"],"keywords":"british renaissance,immigrant,immigration,poland,solidarity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0513468/","name":"Eugene Lipinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822321/","name":"Jirí Stanislav"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0804592/","name":"Jerzy Skolimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103461/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159436/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0804592/","name":"Jerzy Skolimowski"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

One and Two
programme.desc: One and Two: Directed by Andrew Droz Palermo. With Kiernan Shipka, Timothée Chalamet, Elizabeth Reaser, Grant Bowler. Two siblings discover a supernatural escape from a troubled home, but find their bond tested when reality threatens to tear their family apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3975510/","name":"One and Two","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkyNWM3MzYtMzE2Mi00NzQxLTgzM2QtNmMyMzUwYjdiM2RkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDcxNzU3MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two siblings discover a supernatural escape from a troubled home, but find their bond tested when reality threatens to tear their family apart.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3975510/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fimleikastjarna"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"WTF","reviewBody":"I am so confused, what did I just watch? It feels like a movie that is arty and philosophical but it isn't. The only reason to watch this movie is if you have an hour and a half to kill and you really like Timotheé Chalamet. It is a beautiful film at times, aesthetically pleasing. The story goes nowhere and if there is a meaning to it, it is lost on me. Maybe I am not deep or arty enough to understand it. It seems to have some religious undertones. Sometimes it is meditative though to watch something that has a beautiful boy in it and some nice nature shots.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1881,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-14","keywords":"female cinematographer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153783065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxMDUzNDYxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjE3NjMzNjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxMDUzNDYxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjE3NjMzNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer #1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2215143/","name":"Kiernan Shipka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3154303/","name":"Timothée Chalamet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0714147/","name":"Elizabeth Reaser"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3902730/","name":"Andrew Droz Palermo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0488623/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0846839/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0433239/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3902730/","name":"Andrew Droz Palermo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4662697/","name":"Neima Shahdadi"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sniper: Ghost Shooter
Snajper: Niewidzialny zabójca
Sniper: Ghost Shooter
programme.desc: Sniper: Ghost Shooter: Directed by Don Michael Paul. With Chad Michael Collins, Billy Zane, Dennis Haysbert, Nick Gomez. Snipers ordered to protect a gas pipeline from terrorists suspect a security breach when they're targeted by a ghost shooter who knows their location." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5090828/","name":"Sniper: Ghost Shooter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFjOGVjNjctN2ZhZS00MWYxLTk3MGEtZWRjNTgzZmRkZjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ1MDE0NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Snipers ordered to protect a gas pipeline from terrorists suspect a security breach when they're targeted by a ghost shooter who knows their location.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5090828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tabuno"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Fresh Perspective on Sniper Movies","reviewBody":"19 February 2017. This rather mainstream, action-thriller incorporates the penchant of bigger and thus perhaps better movie making philosophy by taking some good sniper movies and placing them in a somewhat larger geo-political arena and using a large special ops team instead of the individual sniper and spotter concept. A superb comparison is Jean-Jacques Annaud's Enemy at the Gates (2001) starring Jude Law and Ed Harris one of the most psychologically intense and balance movies about snipers, this one set during World War II Germany. Another nice comparison for super-charged, hi-tech political thriller would be Tony Scott's Spy Game starring Robert Redford and Brad Pitt that came out the same year.\n\nSniper has the exciting, energizing musicality of The Bourne Identity (2002) and the rich exotic flair of foreign Cityscapes of Bond movies. What Sniper offers is the incorporation of the fascinating intensity of specialized lethal killing along with the use of technology and teamwork against an almost as astute adversary. Yet this movie falls a bit short of the adversarial balance of Enemy at the Gates and the complex machinations of Spy Game.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3655,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-08-02","keywords":"sequel,sixth part,direct to video,terrorist,terrorist group","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sniper: Ghost Shooter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2350429977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUyMTMwOTQtMDI0NC00ZjQzLTk5MmEtMjc3ZTI2YjM1NzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUyMTMwOTQtMDI0NC00ZjQzLTk5MmEtMjc3ZTI2YjM1NzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Sniper: Ghost Shooter"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1792864/","name":"Chad Michael Collins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000708/","name":"Billy Zane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371660/","name":"Dennis Haysbert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666806/","name":"Don Michael Paul"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0201678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065847/","name":"Michael Frost Beckner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508052/","name":"Crash Leyland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369675/","name":"Chris Hauty"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

Another nice comparison for super-charged, hi-tech political thriller would be Tony Scott's Spy Game starring Robert Redford and Brad Pitt that came out the same year.\n\nSniper has the exciting, energizing musicality of The Bourne Identity (2002) and the rich exotic flair of foreign Cityscapes of Bond movies. What Sniper offers is the incorporation of the fascinating intensity of specialized lethal killing along with the use of technology and teamwork against an almost as astute adversary. Yet this movie falls a bit short of the adversarial balance of Enemy at the Gates and the complex machinations of Spy Game.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3655,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-08-02","keywords":"sequel,sixth part,direct to video,terrorist,terrorist group","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sniper: Ghost Shooter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2350429977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUyMTMwOTQtMDI0NC00ZjQzLTk5MmEtMjc3ZTI2YjM1NzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUyMTMwOTQtMDI0NC00ZjQzLTk5MmEtMjc3ZTI2YjM1NzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Sniper: Ghost Shooter","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1792864/","name":"Chad Michael Collins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000708/","name":"Billy Zane","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371660/","name":"Dennis Haysbert"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666806/","name":"Don Michael Paul"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0201678/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065847/","name":"Michael Frost Beckner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508052/","name":"Crash Leyland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369675/","name":"Chris Hauty"],"duration":"PT1H39M"</script><metacontent="
