programme.title: Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister
Łowcy burz
Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister
programme.desc: Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister: Directed by Mark Sobel. With Kelly McGillis, Wolf Larson, Liz Torres, Adrian Zmed. When a tornado takes her meteorologist husband's life, his wife and colleague devotes her own life to prove his theories that violent twisters are predictable." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0158242/","name":"Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODY4NzE2MjkwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY5OTAyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a tornado takes her meteorologist husband's life, his wife and colleague devotes her own life to prove his theories that violent twisters are predictable.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0158242/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Generic Twister copy","reviewBody":"STORM CHASERS: REVENGE OF THE TWISTER - ludicrous sub-title aside - is your generic Canadian-shot TV movie without an ounce of wit or originality to recommend it. It's a sub-standard copy of, surprise surprise, TWISTER, with Kelly McGillis taking on the role of the dedicated storm chaser who doesn't let family bereavement get in her way of going after the big one.\n\nThis doesn't even have the decency to be as fun and cheesy as a SyFy Channel or Asylum movie, because there's barely any disaster material to be had from it. For most of the time we get characters chatting and occasionally arguing, which makes for a boring viewing experience. The worst thing about STORM CHASERS is the quality of the writing, which is very bad indeed and mishandles all of the characters in the story. And the special effects are so poor that they're kept off screen for the most part. Nobody will be 'chasing' this film, that's for sure.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":477,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1998-05-17","keywords":"disaster movie,disaster film,female protagonist,hurricane,storm","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000534/","name":"Kelly McGillis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0489112/","name":"Wolf Larson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005500/","name":"Liz Torres"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811764/","name":"Mark Sobel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015207/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045895/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167736/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0944034/","name":"Jeffrey Wynne"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Pretender
Kameleon
The Pretender
programme.desc: The Pretender: Created by Steven Long Mitchell, Craig W. Van Sickle. With Michael T. Weiss, Andrea Parker, Patrick Bauchau, Jon Gries. A specially gifted man, with the ability to instantly master any skill, escapes from a secret testing facility and travels the country taking on different jobs and helping strangers while hiding from his kidnappers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0115320/","name":"The Pretender","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTdlNWNkZWEtMDg0MS00N2Y2LThhM2QtMDUxOGMxYzBkYzExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjczOTU2NTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A specially gifted man, with the ability to instantly master any skill, escapes from a secret testing facility and travels the country taking on different jobs and helping strangers while hiding from his kidnappers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0115320/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tattooedmunky75"},"dateCreated":"2005-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"There are re-runs among us...","reviewBody":"I somehow missed this show in its original run in the mid/late 90's. But as luck would have it, I've recently discovered this show in re-runs and was so interested by it that I even bought the Season 1 DVD set. The show consists of a hero (Jarod) who is a genius capable of insinuating himself into any profession or situation. Kidnapped as a child and exploited by "The Centre", Jarod escapes and sets out to find his long-lost parents. During his search, Jarod uses his abilities to seek justice for strangers he reads about in newspaper articles. Part of what makes this series great is the relationship between Jarod and Centre psychologist/instructor Sydney who has raised Jarod from childhood and become the closest thing Jarod has ever known to a father. Additionally, Centre Hench-woman "Miss Parker" tracks Jarod relentlessly, while discovering more and more that the Centre has manipulated her own life almost as much as they have Jarod's. The only negative thing I have to say about this show is that it was canceled prior to its conclusion. An attempt at a TV Movie "Pretender 2001" was made to give us the answers about Jarod's family but I have yet to find a copy to see how it ends. It's too bad there aren't quality shows like this on today to save us from Reality-TV."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15335,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1996-09-19","keywords":"on the run,prodigy,cult favorite,blue cove delaware,manhunt","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919117/","name":"Michael T. Weiss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0662042/","name":"Andrea Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000872/","name":"Patrick Bauchau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0062991/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593749/","name":"Steven Long Mitchell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0887978/","name":"Craig W. Van Sickle"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pretender, The (German Trailer)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1137949977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTAzNjdiODMtNjI5ZS00ZTA4LTgzMTktNWJlMjEzYjgzOWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTAzNjdiODMtNjI5ZS00ZTA4LTgzMTktNWJlMjEzYjgzOWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pretender, The (German Trailer)"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Deliverance
Uwolnienie
Deliverance
programme.desc:
Deliverance: Directed by John Boorman. With Jon Voight, Burt Reynolds, Ned Beatty, Ronny Cox. Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0068473/","name":"Deliverance","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBhYzU3NWItOWZjMy00NjI5LWFmYmItZmIyOWFlMDIxMWNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0068473/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chain67"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliantly Harrowing Film","reviewBody":"After having seen Deliverance, movies like Pulp Fiction don't seem so extreme. Maybe by today's blood and bullets standards it doesn't seem so edgy, but if you think that this was 1972 and that the movie has a truly sinister core then it makes you think differently.

When I started watching this movie nothing really seemed unusual until I got to the "Dueling Banjos" scene. In that scene the brutality and edge of this film is truly visible. As I watched Drew(Ronny Cox,Robocop)go head to head with a seemingly retarted young boy it really shows how edgy this movies can get. When you think that the kid has a small banjo, which he could of probably made by hand, compared to Drew's nice expensive guitar, you really figure out just how out of their territory the four men are.

 As the plot goes it's very believable and never stretches past its limits. But what really distinguishes this film, about four business men who get more than they bargained for on a canoe trip, is that director John Boorman(Excalibur) breaks all the characters away from plain caricatures or stereotypes. So as the movie goes into full horror and suspense I really cared about all four men and what would happen to them.

The acting is universally excellent. With Jon Voight(Midnight Cowboy, Enemy of the State) and Burt Reynolds(Boogie Nights, Striptease) leading the great cast. Jon Voight does probably the hardest thing of all in this film and that is making his transformation from family man to warrior very believable. Unlike Reynolds whose character is a warrior from the start, Voight's character transforms over the course of the movie. Ned Beatty(Life) is also good in an extremely hard role, come on getting raped by a hillbilly, while Ronny Cox turns in a believable performance.

One thing that really made this movies powerful for me is that the villains were as terrifying as any I had ever seen. Bill Mckinney and Herbert "Cowboy" Coward were excellent and extremely frightening as the hillbilly's.

 Overall Deliverance was excellent and I suggest it to anyone, except for people with weak stomachs and kids. 10/10. IMDb data; ttnr: 0068473, Title: Deliverance, --- Description: Deliverance: Directed by John Boorman. With Jon Voight, Burt Reynolds, Ned Beatty, Ronny Cox. Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0068473/","name":"Deliverance","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBhYzU3NWItOWZjMy00NjI5LWFmYmItZmIyOWFlMDIxMWNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0068473/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chain67","dateCreated":"2000-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliantly Harrowing Film","reviewBody":"After having seen Deliverance, movies like Pulp Fiction don't seem so extreme. Maybe by today's blood and bullets standards it doesn't seem so edgy, but if you think that this was 1972 and that the movie has a truly sinister core then it makes you think differently.

When I started watching this movie nothing really seemed unusual until I got to the "Dueling Banjos" scene. In that scene the brutality and edge of this film is truly visible. As I watched Drew(Ronny Cox,Robocop)go head to head with a seemingly retarted young boy it really shows how edgy this movies can get. When you think that the kid has a small banjo, which he could of probably made by hand, compared to Drew's nice expensive guitar, you really figure out just how out of their territory the four men are.

 As the plot goes it's very believable and never stretches past its limits. But what really distinguishes this film, about four business men who get more than they bargained for on a canoe trip, is that director John Boorman(Excalibur) breaks all the characters away from plain caricatures or stereotypes. So as the movie goes into full horror and suspense I really cared about all four men and what would happen to them.

The acting is universally excellent. With Jon Voight(Midnight Cowboy, Enemy of the State) and Burt Reynolds(Boogie Nights, Striptease) leading the great cast. Jon Voight does probably the hardest thing of all in this film and that is making his transformation from family man to warrior very believable. Unlike Reynolds whose character is a warrior from the start, Voight's character transforms over the course of the movie. Ned Beatty(Life) is also good in an extremely hard role, come on getting raped by a hillbilly, while Ronny Cox turns in a believable performance.

One thing that really made this movies powerful for me is that the villains were as terrifying as any I had ever seen. Bill Mckinney and Herbert "Cowboy" Coward were excellent and extremely frightening as the hillbilly's.

 Overall Deliverance was excellent and I suggest it to anyone, except for people with weak stomachs and kids. 10/10. See this movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":103329,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1972-08-18","keywords":"survival,male rape,nature,redneck,rape","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Deliverance","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1705050393","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1NmM5NjAtYTFhYS00OGMyLTgwM2QtNzYxOWQ3ZTg2MTc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1NmM5NjAtYTFhYS00OGMyLTgwM2QtNzYxOWQ3ZTg2MTc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000685/","name":"Jon Voight","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000608/","name":"Burt Reynolds","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000885/","name":"Ned Beatty"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000958/","name":"John Boorman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0229197/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225463/","name":"James Dickey","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000958/","name":"John Boorman"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Quarantine
Kwarantanna
Quarantine
programme.desc:
Quarantine: Directed by John Erick Dowdle. With Jennifer Carpenter, Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech. A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1082868/","name":"Quarantine","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0MDgwNTQ4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQzNjY3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1082868/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Anonymous_Maxine"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simple, basic logic is unusually destructive here, even for a horror movie","reviewBody":"Quarantine starts off reasonably well, if not at all originally. A small film crew is doing a ride- along with the fire department to get a first hand look at what their daily professional lives are really like. The film is presented the film crew's unedited stock footage, so we get lots of video of the firemen acting not at all like firemen but instead like young men who are living in close quarters for long periods of time. Finally an interesting call comes in and the crew are called out to a building in town. 

Up to this point, the movie is presented in a style even more realistic than a documentary, because the footage that we see is not even edited. Once they arrive at the building, of course, weird things start happening.

You know the premise, the movie is essentially a zombie movie, but a lot of the suspense and tension is predicated on the fact that this group of innocent people have been for some reason barricaded inside a building by the police, government, military, whatever. Soon we find out that it's the Center For Disease Control doing the quarantining, but the point is, the people that are meant to protect us are locking these innocent people inside a building and leaving them for dead and the people inside have no idea why.

But here's my first question, how do you lock an entire modern fire crew inside an old, dilapidated building presumably made primarily of plaster and wood? Later they discover that approaching windows is enough to get yourself shot, but after what happened soon after they arrived at the building, I am willing to bet that none of those guys would have been willing to spend more than two or three minutes locked unwillingly inside the building.

Next, it seems that breaking through plaster walls is not the only bit of standard fireman training that these guys are lacking. When people start getting hurt, at one point one of the firemen calls out, "Is there a doctor in the house?" I had been under the impression that in order to be a fireman you have to have some emergency medical treatment training, but I could be wrong. I had to do the training in order to be a summer camp counselor a couple years ago, but maybe sleep-away camps are just stricter than your typical major city fire department.

Jennifer Carpenter is the lead character, the host of the documentary that the film crew was making. You may remember her from The Exorcism of Emily Rose, the astonishingly scary horror film that she starred in back in 2004. Sadly, Quarantine just doesn't have the story or the content to give her much to do except run around looking scared. Her performance as Emily Rose was one of the best horror performances I've ever seen, but Quarantine just gives the feeling that she's waiting for an opportunity or a good reason to do some real horror acting.

Overall the movie is not bad, but it is overwhelmingly casual in its presentation of a typical horror movie, this time with the slight variation that all of the victims are trapped in close quarters with the zombies. They have zombies trying to get them inside the building, and humans on the outside pointing guns at the building to prevent any escape and outbreak of the virus causing the zombiness.

There is an interesting scene where the cameraguy actually uses the camera to bludgeon one of the zombies to death, which provides a unique point of view. I had never seen a zombie killed in a movie like that before, but other than that there is just not much special about the movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"found footage,apartment building,trapped,virus,quarantine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Quarantine","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3133276441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzMDM1Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk0OTAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzMDM1Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk0OTAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Quarantine - Theatrical Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1358539/","name":"Jennifer Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004996/","name":"Steve Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1551922/","name":"Columbus Short"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235719/","name":"John Erick Dowdle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0245483/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235719/","name":"John Erick Dowdle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1803105/","name":"Drew Dowdle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0049371/","name":"Jaume Balagueró"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

Wieczór kawalerski
Bachelor Night
programme.desc:
Bachelor Night: Directed by Maximilian Elfeldt, Jeff Newman. With Andrew Bongiorno, Skyler Yeast, Phillip Andre Botello, Lenny Hernandez. When a bachelor party and a bachelorette party cross paths in Vegas, only the best man and the maid of honor can save their friends from a night of epic "mistakes."" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3797142/","name":"Bachelor Night","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMTUzNzUxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM0NTIwMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a bachelor party and a bachelorette party cross paths in Vegas, only the best man and the maid of honor can save their friends from a night of epic "mistakes."","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3797142/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jd-creativeguy"},"dateCreated":"2017-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"C'mon, were you expecting Oscar-worthy acting?","reviewBody":"I dunno, maybe I'm crazy but as far as raunchy B-movies go, this one was actually fairly decent. I laughed, I cried, I admired lots of boobs—who had the best roles in the movie, actually. The Vegas cut-scenes thrown in like a truly high-end iMovie user took the cake, baby! Real cinematography genius there. As an added bonus, the music was actually pretty good.

Worth the hour or so of your time to watch, if only for the boobs and the music... but if you were looking for more than that (why would you every need more than that in a movie is beyond me), you're going to be disappointed.

Baaaaahhhh, who am I kidding? The music wasn't that great either.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1625,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.5},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2014-08-12","keywords":"seduction,bondage,topless female nudity,strip club,female nudity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3700198/","name":"Andrew Bongiorno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6455550/","name":"Skyler Yeast"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1850901/","name":"Phillip Andre Botello"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3965248/","name":"Maximilian Elfeldt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4535705/","name":"Jeff Newman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4535705/","name":"Jeff Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3764663/","name":"Brian Misakian"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3965248/","name":"Maximilian Elfeldt"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Reptisaurus
Reptisaurus
programme.desc: Reptisaurus: Directed by Christopher Ray. With Gil Gerard, Bernard Fredericks, Michael Galvez, Eric Fischer. When a group of friends get stranded on a seemingly deserted island, they soon realize that they're not alone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1277731/","name":"Reptisaurus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMDcwOTkwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDExOTQ0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a group of friends get stranded on a seemingly deserted island, they soon realize that they're not alone.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1277731/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"busterggi"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"About your average SyFy Channel movie.","reviewBody":"Well There is a cgi monster which varies in size from shot to shot, it has no motivation for just killing everyone it encounters (not hungry, not scared, not territorial) although the characters are so bland that death is a sweet release for them.\n\nHonestly, I was a huge fan of the original comic (Charleton Comics give you more!) back in the early '60's and the producers using the name is why I watched it. programme.title: The Riverbank
Na brzegu rzeki
The Riverbank
programme.desc: The Riverbank: Directed by John L'Ecuyer. With Rick Roberts, Kenneth Welsh, Kari Matchett, Cindy Doire. A woman returns to her hometown following the death of her fathers second wife, which leads her to uncover dark family secrets." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2124973/","name":"The Riverbank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZlOGEyYzMtNTE3OS00NmEyLTgyZmUtZjMyZjE2NTIwM2Y4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY5MTYzNDA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman returns to her hometown following the death of her fathers second wife, which leads her to uncover dark family secrets.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2124973/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"phatandys"},"dateCreated":"2015-12-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kari Matchett Reigns Supreme","reviewBody":"A really good movie. Of course Kari Matchett again hits it out of the ballpark with her usual aplomb, her performance alone is worth the time invested. But Kari didn't have to do all the heavy lifting because the casting of this movie is unusually strong. Inga Cadranel shined as she stood out among a really fine acting lineup, usually there is always at least one actor'ess/character who is unable to keep up but this movie's cast is really solid. Writing never lost track of the pace, nor insulted us with tropes, the mood was almost noir-like and I appreciated the writers not resorting to the easy-out way with their story. The direction was on a Hollywood feature level and the production levels were tops. You can tell those associated with this movie were pros. I have to say this again, if Kari Matchett is cast in a TV/Movie it is must see viewing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-10-03","keywords":"open marriage,family secret,flashback,two word title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731519/","name":"Rick Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920564/","name":"Kenneth Welsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558182/","name":"Kari Matchett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0478286/","name":"John L'Ecuyer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0389034/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075779/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5249971/","name":"Genni Gunn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524905/","name":"Graham Ludlow"}],"duration":"PT1H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Space Truckers
Kowboje przestrzeni
Space Truckers
programme.desc:
Space Truckers: Directed by Stuart Gordon. With Tim Loane, Ian Beattie, Olwen Fouéré, Shane Rimmer. A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120199/","name":"Space Truckers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjZkMzkxMzgtNmZhMC00ODc3LTllMmYtMTRlODhiZjBjOWU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120199/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupidly awesome","reviewBody":"The plot: Space truckers run into problems with space pirates, space politicians, and killer robots (who, technically, are not space robots).

Space Truckers is essentially a low budget, B movie space opera that's a parody of low budget, B movie space operas. It's full of cheesy lines, cheesy set design, and cheesy special effects. In fact, it's such a cheesy movie that it sometimes makes The Rocky Horror Picture Show look like The Godfather. At its heart, this movie is stupid, pointless, mindless, and has nothing to say about the human condition, except that it's funny to laugh at bad movies. If you're a Stuart Gordon fan, that's probably enough for you to enjoy this. As an added bonus, it's got a great cast, including many B movie veterans.

It can be enjoyed as either a so-bad-it's-good B movie or a clever parody. Like most Stuart Gordon films, it has rather narrow demographic appeal, and people who are not genre fans (or Stuart Gordon fans) are likely to hate it. I love Stanley Kubrick as much as the next film snob, but the world also needs ridiculous movies like Space Truckers and The Toxic Avenger. In fact, this movie is something of a marriage between Troma and New World Pictures. If you're unfamiliar with those studios -- or you dislike their copious output -- I'd strongly warn you away from this film. Space Truckers was reviled by the critics, rejected by audiences, and thought to be unintentionally funny by B movie fans. Well, for the true believers, this is an awesome movie, and nothing will ever convince us otherwise. Such is the cult of Stuart Gordon!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7366,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"keywords":"b movie,triton,neptune,defensive line,severed foot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Space Truckers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2610102553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlmNDRiMDgtYmVmNy00MGU1LWI2MGMtYTZmMWMzYTBhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlmNDRiMDgtYmVmNy00MGU1LWI2MGMtYTZmMWMzYTBhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sterling Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516385/","name":"Tim Loane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064155/","name":"Ian Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0288260/","name":"Olwen Fouéré"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002340/","name":"Stuart Gordon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045569/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078216/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156955/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1949279/","name":"Ted Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002340/","name":"Stuart Gordon"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356618/","name":"The Forgotten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMjIyNjU4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE3NjYyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356618/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"suspiria10"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""I believe", Scully...","reviewBody":"Telly Paretta is seeing a shrink as therapy for losing her son in a plane crash, only she never had a son but is convinced she had. All the people in her life don't remember Sam including her husband. When she confronts the alcoholic fathers of another child from the flight they set out to discover the truth and the truth is "out there".

Part X-Files and part Lifetime movie of the week, "The Forgotten" seems to really channel Chris Carter's hit TV show, look it even has a redhead. The story is interesting and Julianne Moore's performance is sincere but you can't help but think that something is missing. The clever twist is good but they could have easily expanded the storyline and made it more "something".

Good but not great, "The Forgotten" seems to lack its own identity due to the derivative nature of the storyline which needed a bit of assistance from Fox Mulder.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65041,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-12-08","keywords":"abduction,conspiracy,mother son relationship,children,therapy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Forgotten","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1626472729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NkMmU5YjctNWI2OC00M2ZjLWE3YTUtNmUxY2U0ZTg2MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NkMmU5YjctNWI2OC00M2ZjLWE3YTUtNmUxY2U0ZTg2MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922035/","name":"Dominic West"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1468254/","name":"Christopher Kovaleski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0747849/","name":"Joseph Ruben"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021095/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090778/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224187/","name":"Gerald Di Pego"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0265808/","name":"Stealing Harvard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZhMGIyNGMtN2NmYy00OTBhLWE3NWQtMGQ3ZmNmZGUwMDg1L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0265808/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"a silly comedy that works","reviewBody":"Call me crazy, but I liked this movie. It had its moments. I especially liked Elaine's dad; his character was the funniest. The part where John and Mr. Warner end up in drag at the judge's house was so funny. Then the end was great when John writes I have the picture, and the judge lets him off. And all the silly ideas John and Duff come up with to get the money were quite entertaining. I liked the fact that for once, Tom Green didn't play a gross out character.\n\nFINAL VERDICT: This is a comedy worth seeing. It's only about 80 minutes long, but that's about right for a Tom Green movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2002-09-13","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,harvard,black comedy,crying during sex,voice over narration","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stealing Harvard","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4237989913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Stealing Harvard"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005134/","name":"Jason Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338381/","name":"Tom Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005182/","name":"Leslie Mann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567126/","name":"Bruce McCulloch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405271/","name":"Martin Hynes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865847/","name":"Peter Tolan"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pineapple Express
Boski chillout
Pineapple Express
programme.desc:
Pineapple Express: Directed by David Gordon Green. With Seth Rogen, James Franco, Danny McBride, Kevin Corrigan. A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0910936/","name":"Pineapple Express","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1MTE4NzAwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg3Mjg2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0910936/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcpunkrocka36"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too Vile, Too Racy, Too Brutal...Loved It.","reviewBody":"I went into this thinking I was going to see a drugged up Superbad, let's be honest a lot of Apatow Productions aren't very diverse. This really took a step away from the everyday new generation comedy and did something a little different. This movie just felt like an action all the way, if that's what they were going for then bravo. Of course it had more drug use than most movies, but hey it's Seth Rogan, what did you expect.

The actions scenes were not only original, funny, and different, they were entertainingly brutal. This movie does have a lot of gore, but it is used in the best sense. As far as James Franco, I have never been a fan. I thought he was kind of over the top in Spiderman, I haven't really liked him in any other movies, but I loved him in this, in my own opinion he should stick to comedy.

The only reason I gave this a 7 out of 10 is because as I was writing this I more and more felt like it was one of those movies that will get old if you watch it too much. Don't get me wrong, I was highly entertained, but I don't think I want to see it TOO much.

Overall though...Seth Rogan you've done it again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":325371,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2008-08-06","keywords":"stoner,marijuana,falling downhill,watching tv,man tied up","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pineapple Express: Theatrical trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2729574681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTY4NzYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3NDEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTY4NzYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3NDEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for David Gordon Green's Pineapple Express."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0170550/","name":"Gary Cole"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0337773/","name":"David Gordon Green"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073081/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1698571/","name":"Evan Goldberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0031976/","name":"Judd Apatow"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0910936, Title: Pineapple Express, --- Description: Pineapple Express: Directed by David Gordon Green. With Seth Rogen, James Franco, Danny McBride, Kevin Corrigan. A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0910936/","name":"Pineapple Express","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1MTE4NzAwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg3Mjg2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0910936/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dcpunkrocka36","dateCreated":"2008-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too Vile, Too Racy, Too Brutal...Loved It.","reviewBody":"I went into this thinking I was going to see a drugged up Superbad, let's be honest a lot of Apatow Productions aren't very diverse. This really took a step away from the everyday new generation comedy and did something a little different. This movie just felt like an action all the way, if that's what they were going for then bravo. Of course it had more drug use than most movies, but hey it's Seth Rogan, what did you expect.

The actions scenes were not only original, funny, and different, they were entertainingly brutal. This movie does have a lot of gore, but it is used in the best sense. As far as James Franco, I have never been a fan. I thought he was kind of over the top in Spiderman, I haven't really liked him in any other movies, but I loved him in this, in my own opinion he should stick to comedy.

The only reason I gave this a 7 out of 10 is because as I was writing this I more and more felt like it was one of those movies that will get old if you watch it too much. Don't get me wrong, I was highly entertained, but I don't think I want to see it TOO much.

Overall though...Seth Rogan you've done it again.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":325371,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2008-08-06","keywords":"stoner,marijuana,falling downhill,watching tv,man tied up","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pineapple Express: Theatrical trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2729574681","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTY4NzYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3NDEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTY4NzYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3NDEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for David Gordon Green's Pineapple Express.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0170550/","name":"Gary Cole"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0337773/","name":"David Gordon Green"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073081/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1698571/","name":"Evan Goldberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0031976/","name":"Judd Apatow"],"duration":"PT1H51M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Doom
Doom
programme.desc: Doom: Directed by Andrzej Bartkowiak. With Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Deobia Oparei, Ben Daniels. Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0419706/","name":"Doom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2QwMzZiYmUtNGZhMC00ZjA2LWI2MDYtOWEyNDA4MzYwMTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0419706/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JERICH9478"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Rock and a BFG Make entertaining viewing","reviewBody":"OK, we are all hearing how Doom the movie is a complete sellout etc, but still this is an enjoyable movie. The Rock as Sarge is absolutely perfect! i just couldn't imagine Karl Urban doing a better job then The Rock when it comes to Sarge. Although many have branded this film "Resident Evil in Space" and yeah it is but that doesn't subtract from the film at all. The 1st person scene was especially pulled off well and will give you some giggles (c'mon who didn't laugh?).The Score is absolutely awesome and sets the atmosphere perfectly! too me this film had an old school 80's horror feel to it which i felt made it that more enjoyable (we got lots of uncensored over the top gore which now we don't get enough of). Overall don't judge this movie till you see it because it is a lot better then people rate it unless your looking to find something thats a 100% identical too its source material (Doom 3) then i'd advise you to not watch this film because some of it has been completely rewritten from its original context hence no hell. IMDb data; ttnr: 0419706, Title: Doom, --- Description: Doom: Directed by Andrzej Bartkowiak. With Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Deobia Oparei, Ben Daniels. Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0419706/","name":"Doom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2QwMzZiYmUtNGZhMC00ZjA2LWI2MDYtOWEyNDA4MzYwMTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0419706/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"JERICH9478","dateCreated":"2005-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Rock and a BFG Make entertaining viewing","reviewBody":"OK, we are all hearing how Doom the movie is a complete sellout etc, but still this is an enjoyable movie. The Rock as Sarge is absolutely perfect! i just couldn't imagine Karl Urban doing a better job then The Rock when it comes to Sarge. Although many have branded this film "Resident Evil in Space" and yeah it is but that doesn't subtract from the film at all. The 1st person scene was especially pulled off well and will give you some giggles (c'mon who didn't laugh?).The Score is absolutely awesome and sets the atmosphere perfectly! too me this film had an old school 80's horror feel to it which i felt made it that more enjoyable (we got lots of uncensored over the top gore which now we don't get enough of). Overall don't judge this movie till you see it because it is a lot better then people rate it unless your looking to find something thats a 100% identical too its source material (Doom 3) then i'd advise you to not watch this film because some of it has been completely rewritten from its original context hence no hell. Overall a lot better then what i was expecting too see","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":110770,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2005-11-30","keywords":"survival,brother sister relationship,based on video game,monster,hell","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3115565337","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDBkNDhhOGQtMmY3ZS00ZTc3LTkxOTEtNDViNTkyZTM1NjU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDBkNDhhOGQtMmY3ZS00ZTc3LTkxOTEtNDViNTkyZTM1NjU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881631/","name":"Karl Urban","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005647/","name":"Andrzej Bartkowiak"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0175035/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0834338/","name":"Wesley Strick"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pitch Black
Pitch Black
programme.desc: Pitch Black: Directed by David Twohy. With Vin Diesel, Radha Mitchell, Cole Hauser, Keith David. A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0134847/","name":"Pitch Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTNmYzE1OWYtZDdjNC00OTdhLTg1YjUtYWJlZTVkMzkzNmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0134847/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"malmroes"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie which takes a new approach to the sci-fi genre","reviewBody":"Even though this movie starts off with the usual: something goes wrong, spacecraft crashes, people are stranded etc. it still pulls off and introduces the viewer to some new ideas. Riddick is somewhat of a bad-ass convict and has modified his eyes so he is able to see in the dark which is a much sought after ability due to the situation the ship-crew and he gets in. The cutting in the movie is very good and emphasizes the mystique that shrouds around the anti-hero and male protagonist: "Riddick." The story in Pitch Black is, as already mentioned, to some extent very unoriginal and dissatisfied, but the clipping and cutting in the movie blended with some surprising elements which has been added to the story helps it to still support itself very well and one is afterward left behind with a hybrid feeling of satisfaction and hunger for more. Vin Diesel acts really well in the role as Riddick and even though his character is a hardcore, tough survivor he still takes morale decisions almost on the verge of good, but that does not mean his decisions do not turn in his favor at the very end... Why destroy an already perfect reputation? All in all this is a very good movie though not perfect. The story seems very unoriginal at the surface, but underneath it shines with enough originality to entertain. Some scenes has that wow factor while it as a whole is a bit better than average. It could maybe be described as a cult movie and it is definitely a recommendation for people who wants a spiced up sci-fi story blended with some minor psychological moments and an intriguing protagonist, namely Riddick.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":231325,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2000-02-18","keywords":"darkness,desert,eclipse,survival,spaceship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pitch Black","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi15073561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWJiYzFiZDMtZTUwZi00ZWVlLTg1OTQtODA3NWQ4MDIwNjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWJiYzFiZDMtZTUwZi00ZWVlLTg1OTQtODA3NWQ4MDIwNjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593664/","name":"Radha Mitchell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369513/","name":"Cole Hauser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030612/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923646/","name":"Jim Wheat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003117/","name":"Ken Wheat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

Then the movie comes out and it has got nothing to do with the ending? Don't get me wrong. Resident Evil The Final Chapter was excellent for me. They set us up for one hell of a fight with some characters included then the story following does not have those characters or the story line? MacGyver
MacGyver
programme.desc:
MacGyver: Created by Lee David Zlotoff, Peter M. Lenkov, Paul Downs Colaizzo, Brett Mahoney. With Lucas Till, Tristin Mays, Justin Hires, Meredith Eaton. Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1399045/","name":"MacGyver","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NzUzNmQtMWI2ZC00YzdlLWI5ZTgtMGM3MjJlZTgwYTVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIzMzY2NDQ2._V1_.jpg","description":"Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1399045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"csgollum"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not that bad!","reviewBody":"Most of the reviews here compare this version (inevitably) to the one starring Richard Dean Anderson. Now I've seen only a few episodes of the original and, although there are a few differences, the character itself hasn't changed much. It's like Smallville rather than Superman, a much younger version of the same character.

RDA's MacGyver was quiet and modest and mild-manner, but so is this one. He is as staunchly loyal to his friends as RDA's version. Granted, he frequently breaks the fourth wall, but that only makes the show more believable (at least, to me). Most of the actual 'macgyverings' too are almost equally surprising and awesome. This version does use more chemicals, but then there are more chemicals around us nowadays.

So, for all those comparing this version with the old, just relax and give in to the fun! This is entertainment, after all. My rating: 7 stars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19200,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"character name as series title,surname as series title,one word series title,2010s,reboot","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1395771/","name":"Lucas Till"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159702/","name":"Tristin Mays"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2058713/","name":"Justin Hires"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957453/","name":"Lee David Zlotoff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello","dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Crazy in Alabama
Wariatka z Alabamy
Crazy in Alabama
programme.desc: Crazy in Alabama: Directed by Antonio Banderas. With Melanie Griffith, David Morse, Lucas Black, Cathy Moriarty. An abused wife heads to California to become a movie star while her nephew back in Alabama has to deal with a racially-motivated murder involving a corrupt sheriff." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0142201/","name":"Crazy in Alabama","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjM0MDA3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIwMDYyMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An abused wife heads to California to become a movie star while her nephew back in Alabama has to deal with a racially-motivated murder involving a corrupt sheriff.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0142201/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danvan346-1"},"dateCreated":"2008-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie still works so well for me!","reviewBody":"I am in the process of trying to clean out an oversupply of VHS tapes and some of them are so easy to toss. Not this one. I had to sit down and watch it again and now I could only get rid of the VHS if I had it on DVD! I have not watched this movie in more than six years and it was "feel good" and "feel" all over again. David Morse is always wonderful. Lucas Black, Cathy Moriarty, Meat Loaf, Elizabeth Perkins, and many others are just a treat to watch. There's something about Melanie. I can't help liking her - even when I am finding fault with her. This movie really is strange with its incredibly serious (and gruesome) subject matter of a woman who methodically murders and decapitates her husband and then carries his head around with her - first in Tupperware and then in a very stylish hat box! The surprising part is that there is any plausibility at all, but it somehow existed for me. It had a strange feeling floating about it that was akin to "Forrest Gump" or "Nurse Betty", because it involved situations that were truly horrible, but everything kept working out for a sweet and naive character. The civil rights story was a very poignant counterpoint to the fantastic silliness of Lucille's odyssey. If I were a film student I may have sat there and criticized the way things came together, but I just watched it with an untrained eye, so it was fine. I certainly would have made the connection about a freedom theme even if they hadn't come out and stated it in the end. No one says a story has to be believable or plausible for it to work. This did work. I laughed a lot when I least expected to.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6899,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1999-10-22","keywords":"murder,police,lie,social injustice,racial issues","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crazy in Alabama","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2763981081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdmMGZjYWYtZTBiZC00ZmMyLTljZTQtMjE2NDM4NjA5Yzk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdmMGZjYWYtZTBiZC00ZmMyLTljZTQtMjE2NDM4NjA5Yzk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000429/","name":"Melanie Griffith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001556/","name":"David Morse"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085407/","name":"Lucas Black"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060770/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012600/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0157538/","name":"Mark Childress"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

Not this one. I had to sit down and watch it again and now I could only get rid of the VHS if I had it on DVD! I have not watched this movie in more than six years and it was "feel good" and "feel" all over again. David Morse is always wonderful. Lucas Black, Cathy Moriarty, Meat Loaf, Elizabeth Perkins, and many others are just a treat to watch. There's something about Melanie. I can't help liking her - even when I am finding fault with her. This movie really is strange with its incredibly serious (and gruesome) subject matter of a woman who methodically murders and decapitates her husband and then carries his head around with her - first in Tupperware and then in a very stylish hat box! The surprising part is that there is any plausibility at all, but it somehow existed for me. It had a strange feeling floating about it that was akin to "Forrest Gump" or "Nurse Betty", because it involved situations that were truly horrible, but everything kept working out for a sweet and naive character. The civil rights story was a very poignant counterpoint to the fantastic silliness of Lucille's odyssey. If I were a film student I may have sat there and criticized the way things came together, but I just watched it with an untrained eye, so it was fine. I certainly would have made the connection about a freedom theme even if they hadn't come out and stated it in the end. No one says a story has to be believable or plausible for it to work. This did work. I laughed a lot when I least expected to.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6899,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1999-10-22","keywords":"murder,police,lie,social injustice,racial issues","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crazy in Alabama","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2763981081","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdmMGZjYWYtZTBiZC00ZmMyLTljZTQtMjE2NDM4NjA5Yzk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdmMGZjYWYtZTBiZC00ZmMyLTljZTQtMjE2NDM4NjA5Yzk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000429/","name":"Melanie Griffith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001556/","name":"David Morse","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085407/","name":"Lucas Black"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060770/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012600/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0157538/","name":"Mark Childress"],"duration":"PT1H51M"</script><metacontent="
