programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent="

Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Resident
The Resident
Rezydenci
The Resident
programme.desc:
The Resident: Created by Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, Roshan Sethi. With Matt Czuchry, Manish Dayal, Bruce Greenwood, Emily VanCamp. A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6483832/","name":"The Resident","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1MmE1NGYtMzFlYS00YTNmLThjNmEtMjQ5NzY4NmJkZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMzcxOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fatelovesthefearless"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for yourself! It's not bad!","reviewBody":"It's not the greatest medical drama and does not compare to ER as far as realism goes but as a nurse most of the medical stuff is correct and every show gets stuff wrong so don't not like a medical show because it's not 100% accurate. 

I like that they have taken this show on from a different angle - money and corruption! I don't live in the USA but I imagine this is actually quite accurate in the way hospitals are run and that it is all about money and not necessarily doing what's best for the patient. 

The characters so far are interesting - I'm 7 episodes in and I like that some patients are in it for longer than an episode. There are characters you want to root for the do gooders and there are characters you love to hate who are selfish, rich and really in the wrong business. Oh and there's a main character that's a nurse which is always a plus since we basically make the hospitals run! 

So if you like medical dramas give it a go! I've seen them all - ER is the best, I've got a soft spot for Greys Anatomy even though sometimes it's ridiculous m, Code Black is great, Chicago Med is alright, The night shift was good. They are all entertaining so in my mind they do what they are suppose to!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21065,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. programme.title: Gone in Sixty Seconds
60 sekund
Gone in Sixty Seconds
programme.desc:
Gone in Sixty Seconds: Directed by Dominic Sena. With Nicolas Cage, Giovanni Ribisi, Angelina Jolie, T.J. Cross. A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0187078/","name":"Gone in Sixty Seconds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMzExNDEwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODMxMzg2._V1_.jpg","description":"A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0187078/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bowmanblue"},"dateCreated":"2017-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gone, but not forgotten","reviewBody":"Also, poor Nicholas Cage, I knew him well... Once upon a time (possibly in Las Vegas) he was a Box Office heavyweight. Now... well, you can probably pick up one of his latest films from those buckets you find of DVDs for £2.99 in petrol stations. However, before his decent into depressingly-bad cinema, he made some pretty fun films. Yes, he's won an Oscar in his time for his deep and meaningful acting, but you won't find any of that here. Just fun.

Nicholas Cage plays (basically) Nicholas Cage – only a Nicholas Cage who used to steal expensive cars, only to retire. However, his loose cannon of a brother steals (or doesn't steal – I forget – it doesn't matter!) for (or from) the wrong mobster in L.A. meaning Nicholas Cage the now not-so retired car thief must steal a load of flash motors in one night or his brother ends up in the car crusher (literally!).

If you like fast cars driving even faster (and, judging by the 'Fast and the Furious' franchise a lot of people do) then this one is basically for you. It's an action film and it's pretty much by the numbers, but, when it's such fun, who cares? Everyone cranks their performances up to eleven and it all comes across as one of those adorable eighties and nineties 'over-the-top' action flicks (yes, I know it was made it in 2000, but it sure feels like a nineties movie) with a real cartoony vibe to it. You have Christopher Ecleston plays the 'evil Brit villain' much like any other evil Brit villains you've seen in cinema. Vinnie Jones and Angelina Jolie are on hand to show their faces, but feel a little underused for what they could have been.

Ultimately, it's all on Nicholas Cage's manic shoulders and he does the film proud. It's loud, dumb and it's basically one long car crash that you'll probably be unable to tear your eyes away from.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":267980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2000-06-09","keywords":"auto theft,car,brother,thief,theft","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000610/","name":"Giovanni Ribisi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0784061/","name":"Dominic Sena"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026281/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355181/","name":"H.B. Halicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003298/","name":"Scott Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

Once upon a time (possibly in Las Vegas) he was a Box Office heavyweight. Now... well, you can probably pick up one of his latest films from those buckets you find of DVDs for £2.99 in petrol stations. However, before his decent into depressingly-bad cinema, he made some pretty fun films. Yes, he's won an Oscar in his time for his deep and meaningful acting, but you won't find any of that here. Just fun.

Nicholas Cage plays (basically) Nicholas Cage – only a Nicholas Cage who used to steal expensive cars, only to retire. However, his loose cannon of a brother steals (or doesn't steal – I forget – it doesn't matter!) for (or from) the wrong mobster in L.A. meaning Nicholas Cage the now not-so retired car thief must steal a load of flash motors in one night or his brother ends up in the car crusher (literally!).

If you like fast cars driving even faster (and, judging by the 'Fast and the Furious' franchise a lot of people do) then this one is basically for you. It's an action film and it's pretty much by the numbers, but, when it's such fun, who cares? Everyone cranks their performances up to eleven and it all comes across as one of those adorable eighties and nineties 'over-the-top' action flicks (yes, I know it was made it in 2000, but it sure feels like a nineties movie) with a real cartoony vibe to it. You have Christopher Ecleston plays the 'evil Brit villain' much like any other evil Brit villains you've seen in cinema. Vinnie Jones and Angelina Jolie are on hand to show their faces, but feel a little underused for what they could have been.

Ultimately, it's all on Nicholas Cage's manic shoulders and he does the film proud. It's loud, dumb and it's basically one long car crash that you'll probably be unable to tear your eyes away from.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":267980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2000-06-09","keywords":"auto theft,car,brother,thief,theft","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000610/","name":"Giovanni Ribisi"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0784061/","name":"Dominic Sena"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026281/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355181/","name":"H.B. Halicki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003298/","name":"Scott Rosenberg"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Jurassic Park III: Directed by Joe Johnston. With Sam Neill, William H. Macy, Téa Leoni, Alessandro Nivola. A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163025/","name":"Jurassic Park III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDMyZGJjOGItYjJkZC00MDVlLWE0Y2YtZGIwMDExYWE3MGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYyMDk5MTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163025/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KoolCatReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Always slightly under rated compared to the squel","reviewBody":"I have always felt this movie was better than the second although not as good as the original. This movie is defiantly more in-touch with the original than the second. The characters are likeable and the plot works. The ending though feels rushed, almost like they ran out of budget. Having Sam Neil back in the driving seat improves the film vastly. A Sunday viewing classic worthy to have been the sequel.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":304980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"dinosaur,costa rica,cgi animal in live action title,spinosaurus,island","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jurassic Park Trilogy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2525535257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III debut as a trilogy set on Blu-rayÂ™ October 25, 2011."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000554/","name":"Sam Neill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000513/","name":"William H. programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang: Directed by Shane Black. With Robert Downey Jr., Val Kilmer, Michelle Monaghan, Corbin Bernsen. A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0373469/","name":"Kiss Kiss Bang Bang","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDExMDA3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTc2MzA3._V1_.jpg","description":"A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373469/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"renglish1964"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extremely funny film noir spoof","reviewBody":"I saw this movie at the 2005 Toronto Film Festival and expected it to be the typical film noir genre. This seemed to be the case for the first couple of minutes of narrative monologue before the jokes started coming fast and furious. This turned out to be a highly entertaining comedy/buddy film couched in a tongue in cheek film noir setting. The dialogue was witty and the chemistry between Robert Downey Jr and Val Kilmour was great. Some of the jokes went by so fast that I'll have to see this movie again to see what I missed as I was still laughing at the previous one. The director spoke before the movie and commented on how the producers were nervous about the risky choice of actors. This was a reference to Robert Downey Jr.'s past addiction problems, but this film proved that he was worth the risk. I saw 10 films at this year's film festival and this one was my favorite.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":220675,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-11-18","keywords":"kidnapping,neo noir,actor,thief,mental hospital","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kiss Kiss Bang Bang","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi562411033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1MzI3MTE0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyMDQyMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1MzI3MTE0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyMDQyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Kiss Kiss Bang Bang"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000375/","name":"Robert Downey Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000174/","name":"Val Kilmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157358/","name":"Michelle Monaghan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000948/","name":"Shane Black"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019968/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0356539/","name":"Brett Halliday"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000948/","name":"Shane Black"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We're the Millers
Millerowie
We're the Millers
programme.desc:
We're the Millers: Directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber. With Jennifer Aniston, Jason Sudeikis, Emma Roberts, Will Poulter. A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1723121/","name":"We're the Millers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5Njc0NDUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjYzNzU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1723121/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sanjna-polamarasetty-869-692642"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"An actually funny comedy","reviewBody":"'We're the Millers' follows a drug dealer, a stripper, a runaway and a geek, who come together pretending to be a traditional, all American suburban family to smuggle a whole heap of drugs from Mexico into the US. Fortunately for us, Jennifer Aniston plays a stripper. With all the actors playing surprisingly likable characters, who's opposing chemistry works impeccably when put together. 

I usually find that most of the time, films that parade around claiming to be comedies, usually with one famous face to show, are often just not funny. But 'We're The Millers' was actually a good comedy; probably not in a witty sophisticated way, but it made me laugh. This film also has its emotions, in their own little unconventional ways, considering the leads were not exactly your average person. 

If I had to think of the one thing that I found extremely obnoxious, it would have to be Ed Helms. Everything about his character and his acting, was just annoying, which is probably why the ending made me quite happy. 

Worth watching if you need a no-brainer to spike your mood. And if not for the laughs, I'm sure Jennifer Aniston stripping would do the trick.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":421043,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2013-09-25","keywords":"stripper,girl in panties,wet panties,thong panties,white panties","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi544319001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837177/","name":"Jason Sudeikis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000098/","name":"Jennifer Aniston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731075/","name":"Emma Roberts"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1098493/","name":"Rawson Marshall Thurber"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0459878/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1462097/","name":"Bob Fisher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264520/","name":"Steve Faber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: High Fidelity
Przeboje i podboje
High Fidelity
programme.desc:
High Fidelity: Directed by Stephen Frears. With John Cusack, Iben Hjejle, Todd Louiso, Jack Black. Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0146882/","name":"High Fidelity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxMTI1ODYyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjQyOTI3._V1_.jpg","description":"Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0146882/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieAddict2016"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best of all comedies but also a very poignant study of male life","reviewBody":"Having read the very good Nick Hornby novel of the same name I looked forward to "High Fidelity" quite a bit, but I never expected it to be as good as it is. This is easily one of the best comedies of all time for its laughs alone - but what separates it from other comedies (particularly new-age ones) is that it's a very poignant multi-layered tale that focuses, primarily, on males - and why we are as we are. Love, life, relationships, music, movies, hobbies, jobs, ticks, ups, downs - everything is here.

It's to John Cusack's credit that he took a "classic" contemporary novel set in London and transposed it to Chicago - and it works just as well (if not better) than the British version. It shows what a universal story this actually is, if so many people from all over the world can appreciate it, no matter where it is set. What we lose here are the abbreviations such as "mate," "cos" and other British expressions - but essentially the story is exactly the same, as is the character of Rob Gordon.

Cusack proves his worth here and there isn't a single bad performance in this film, except perhaps for the love interest who tries to sport an American accent and it's quite uneven at times.

Jack Black is fantastically funny and reveals once again why he's leagues ahead of other obese comedians like Chris Farley who merely relied on OTT acts and weight for laughs - Black, like John Candy, actually acts and so far in his career has turned out some really good films which is more than can be said for many of his competitors.

The script has some very funny one-liners and movie/music in-jokes (I love the "Evil Dead" bit - "Because it's so funny, and violent, it's got a kick-a$$ soundtrack...and it's so violent!").

But at the end of the day what really haunted me (so to speak) about this movie long after I had seen it was the fact that it DOES stay with you ages after the credits have stopped rolling. It's poignant and really spot-on in many regards - add that to a film full of flawless performances and great direction and clever ideas and one-liners and jokes, and you've got a top-notch comedic masterpiece that places "High Fidelity" in the top ranks of American (and British!) comedy - "with," as the DVD back cover says, "a bullet." Highly recommended. 5/5","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173574,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2000-03-31","keywords":"employer employee relationship,two word title,breaking the fourth wall,talking to the camera,record store","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'High Fidelity' !?!?! Anniversary Mashup","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2711600665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZkMGNkYjEtYTNjOS00ODBhLWI3YjMtYzYxNjk4OWVhN2NlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZkMGNkYjEtYTNjOS00ODBhLWI3YjMtYzYxNjk4OWVhN2NlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In celebration of the 20th anniversary of 'High Fidelity,' we take a look back at the Stephen Frears film, starring John Cusack, Jack Black, and Lisa Bonet."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000131/","name":"John Cusack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005013/","name":"Iben Hjejle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0521974/","name":"Todd Louiso"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001241/","name":"Stephen Frears"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035313/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394984/","name":"Nick Hornby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0222584/","name":"D.V. DeVincentis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684336/","name":"Steve Pink"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

A teenager's adventures as a bounty hunter take an unexpected twist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5294522/","name":"Dreamland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWIzMTgyYWUtOWJhMy00MTlhLWJlOWItYjdhY2FlNDY5MmE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenager's adventures as a bounty hunter take an unexpected twist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5294522/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"andreascaloni"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"GOOD MOVIE WITH GREAT PERFORMANCES","reviewBody":"Dreamland is about a teen bounty hunter that is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression. programme.title: 100 Dinge
100 rzeczy
100 Dinge
programme.desc: 100 Dinge: Directed by Florian David Fitz. With Florian David Fitz, Matthias Schweighöfer, Miriam Stein, Hannelore Elsner. Best friends Toni and Paul decide to relinquish all of their belongings for 100 days, whereby they receive one of their items back on each day. During this challenge the two realize, that the only thing they cannot be without is their friendship. A story about contemporary materialism and the quest for the truely important things in life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8129794/","name":"100 Dinge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThkYzQwZjktYzE4ZC00NWI2LThkNzMtMDIzNDY0YzM0OTU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzgwNTE2MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Best friends Toni and Paul decide to relinquish all of their belongings for 100 days, whereby they receive one of their items back on each day. During this challenge the two realize, that the only thing they cannot be without is thei","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8129794/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cmelaniesenf"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"who was the intended target group for this movie?","reviewBody":"I usually don't like German productions. Our films and tv shows have the tendency to feel like rip-offs of American productions with no desire to put our mark on it. But this, 100 things, actually surprised me. Yes, the production could have chosen different actors for once. Young, aspiring ones, who are more aware of the issue. More involved. Matthias Schweighöfer and Florian David Fitz are 40 years old. Settled. Living low-key. I, as a female, 10 years younger doesn't relate to them, nor would the Millennials or the generation Z. So, who was the intended target group for this movie? I also didn't understand the need to use a stand-in for Mark Zuckerberg. Like there are no other (famous) investors. Why give the investor a name anyway with the rise and fall of companies these days? But apart from all that, the plot was really good. Something we all should think about since we became a throwaway society. Heavily supporting all the Primarks these days and its factories in low-wage countries. Paying dumping prices for clothes, furniture's, jewelry etc. and are proud of it. Is that essential for a your life?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5188,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-12-06","keywords":"reference to hertha bsc,male nudity,male rear nudity,naked in public,public nudity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164552/","name":"Florian David Fitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0777788/","name":"Matthias Schweighöfer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0825587/","name":"Miriam Stein"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164552/","name":"Florian David Fitz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143779/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0305258/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164552/","name":"Florian David Fitz"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Percy: Directed by Clark Johnson. With Christopher Walken, Roberta Maxwell, Christina Ricci, Zach Braff. A Canadian farmer takes on a giant corporation after their GMOs interfere with his crops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8976696/","name":"Percy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA4MDMwYzItMTNkYS00NjhhLTkwODUtNTE1ZDc0ZTUzMzdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDAyMTY3OTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Canadian farmer takes on a giant corporation after their GMOs interfere with his crops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8976696/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BrandedToKill"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"The GMO companies must be writing the bad reviews","reviewBody":"We continue to see this same theme over and over, corporations, with their legal army, political influence and unlimited resources , continuing to obliterate the working man. programme.title: Un Disfraz para Nicolas
Nowe przebranie Nicholasa
Un Disfraz para Nicolas
programme.desc: Un Disfraz para Nicolas: Directed by Eduardo Rivero. With Paty Cantú, Fran Fernández, Cristina Hernandez, Ricardo Tejedo. Nicolás is a 10-year-old boy with Down syndrome. Every year, his mother made him a disguise. He was a monkey, a brave pirate, a dragon giant. Unfortunately, his mother dies and Nicolás goes to live with Mia and Tomás, his loving grandparents, and his cousin David, who suffers from nightmares. Nicolás keeps an old man trunk with all its magical costumes. With them, he will undertake an adventure to save his cousin of his nightmares and, incidentally, to a whole kingdom submerged in chaos." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8045396/","name":"Un Disfraz para Nicolas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMyNWZmMmUtY2FmOC00MWI2LWFmYTQtODYxMDQ1MTBiYjQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTgwNjI5MTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Nicolás is a 10-year-old boy with Down syndrome. programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
Wonder Woman
programme.desc:
Wonder Woman 1984: Directed by Patty Jenkins. With Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Kristen Wiig, Pedro Pascal. Diana must contend with a work colleague and businessman, whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7126948/","name":"Wonder Woman 1984","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTlhNzJjYzYtNGU3My00ZDI5LTgzZDUtYzllYjU1ZmU0YTgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQwMDg0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Diana must contend with a work colleague and businessman, whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7126948/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carrion-of-conservatives"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is the person who approved this still working??","reviewBody":"If so, I must join the film industry!! Because you keep your job despite the quality (or lack thereof).

What about the director?

Casting manager??

I admit I fell asleep, which is surprising because i am the type of person who watches everything until the end. I finish it if I begin it. Anyway, my daughter said she recorded herself on Tiktok for half the movie because she was bored.

programme.desc: Stardust: Directed by Matthew Vaughn. With Ian McKellen, Bimbo Hart, Alastair MacIntosh, David Kelly. In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0486655/","name":"Stardust","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjkyMTE1OTYwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDIxODYzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0486655/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nyjazzman"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining and fun to watch......","reviewBody":"Sort of a fairy tale for grown ups, with a great cast. Robert DeNiro is amazing in a supporting role that is a big stretch away from many of his other films, and he does a perfect job. I think he comes close to stealing the movie. Claire Danes and Michelle Pfeiffer both are terrific, and enjoyable to watch as they manage their respective characters. Not too many special effects - just the right amount to advance the story, not to be an end in itself.\n\nCaught this as an unexpected gem on Netflix. Highly recommend this film","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":262628,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2007-10-24","keywords":"witch,magic,one word title,voice over narration,transformation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stardust","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4018471193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM0NDhmOGMtNjk3MS00ZjFkLThhOGQtZmZiYmY5OWI2MDM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM0NDhmOGMtNjk3MS00ZjFkLThhOGQtZmZiYmY5OWI2MDM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1214435/","name":"Charlie Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000132/","name":"Claire Danes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1092227/","name":"Sienna Miller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891216/","name":"Matthew Vaughn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165404/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0325567/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0963359/","name":"Jane Goldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891216/","name":"Matthew Vaughn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301274/","name":"Neil Gaiman"}],"duration":"PT2H7M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Hors normes: Directed by Olivier Nakache, Éric Toledano. With Vincent Cassel, Reda Kateb, Hélène Vincent, Bryan Mialoundama. The story of two men, educators of children and adolescents with autism." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8655470/","name":"Hors normes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzODgxOTktODllNi00ZDA5LWI3YjktYTk0MWIwOGZlYmIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of two men, educators of children and adolescents with autism.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8655470/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vinsond21"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"I wish everyone gets to see this special movie","reviewBody":"It is a shame that a meaningful film like this one is not promoted to get more people to watch it, because it contains many hard truths that need to be told, but at least the filmmakers don't ram the message down the viewer's throat the way some movies do. Vincent Cassel, always a dependable actor, is at his career-best here. He is ably supported by a competent cast led by Reda Kateb. I really wish everyone gets to see this special movie, but it is especially recommended for those who are caregivers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-10-23","keywords":"autist,paris france,autism,autistic man,autistic teenager","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1733017369","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEzN2QyZDItMmRiYy00MGQ5LTg5NmMtMDEzMzY5ZWUyMWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEzN2QyZDItMmRiYy00MGQ5LTg5NmMtMDEzMzY5ZWUyMWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001993/","name":"Vincent Cassel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3024530/","name":"Reda Kateb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898653/","name":"Hélène Vincent"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0619923/","name":"Olivier Nakache"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865918/","name":"Éric Toledano"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098808/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0387248/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079764/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0619923/","name":"Olivier Nakache"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865918/","name":"Éric Toledano"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3960412/","name":"Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxMzk2ODI4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgzNzQ5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3960412/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aaronillustratornh"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Different Comedy Experience","reviewBody":"The movie was set up with a familiar plot that shouldn't really blow anyone out of the water. it also had a unique reality TV type way of shooting the film, but this movie is really meant for one thing. The off the wall humor. However the problems with the film shouldn't discourage people who want laughs! The movie had quite a bit of off the wall humor. Although the movie doesn't have you busting your gut through the entire showing it has it's moments. So if you like The Lonely Island, or Andy Sandberg's humor, go see the movie! In addition I will say I found the music in the film quite entertaining. The "So Humble" song that's at the beginning of the movie and in the trailers is still stuck in my head, and I don't mind.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":58055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Music"],"datePublished":"2016-06-03","keywords":"pop star,scene during end credits,repetition in title,concert,mockumentary","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2277946393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzA4MTIzNzReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU1Mzc0OTgx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzA4MTIzNzReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU1Mzc0OTgx._V1_.jpg","description":"When his new album fails to sell records, pop/rap superstar conner4real goes into a major tailspin and watches his celebrity high life begin to collapse. He'll try anything to bounce back, anything except reuniting with his old rap group The Style Boyz."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676221/","name":"Andy Samberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1672246/","name":"Jorma Taccone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676223/","name":"Akiva Schaffer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676223/","name":"Akiva Schaffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1672246/","name":"Jorma Taccone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0346224/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073081/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676221/","name":"Andy Samberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676223/","name":"Akiva Schaffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1672246/","name":"Jorma Taccone"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: American Pie
American Beauty
programme.desc:
American Pie: Directed by Paul Weitz, Chris Weitz. With Jason Biggs, Jennifer Coolidge, Shannon Elizabeth, Alyson Hannigan. Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163651/","name":"American Pie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3ODY5ODI1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTkxNTYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163651/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jaime N. Christley"},"dateCreated":"1999-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Astoundingly good-natured sex comedy","reviewBody":"The director and the writer, Paul Weitz and Adam Herz respectively, will do anything for a laugh -- that's good, as it turns out, because this movie has a great many laughs in it. There's not much of that restricting, suffocating "logic" stuff around, but "American Pie" is immensely enjoyable. I mean, almost none of the things that happen in this film would ever, ever come to pass in real life, but it doesn't matter.

For starters, the characters aren't all one-dimensional. Thankfully, they're two-dimensional, so right away it has an edge on 60-70% of all the movies ever made.

Moreover, it's heart is in the right place. Most high school movies these days are all about cruelty and malice, especially towards (and among) the women. Not the case here. This is the first conventional high school movie I've ever seen that made me smile so much (I say conventional because "Rushmore" still trumps every one of them).

Furthermore, it's very funny. I wouldn't dare give away any of the really great gags (we've all seen the trailer -- that's not the one I mean), but I'll say this: Weitz and Herz are extraordinarily skilled in audience manipulation, which is to say that they know how and when to spring unexpected surprises upon us. They also know how to use foul language for punch, rather than punctuation.

The soundtrack is another positive. It's all about joy and high energy -- even music from Third Eye Blind and Barenaked Ladies that suffers from radio overplay fits the mood appropriately.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":389112,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1999-07-09","keywords":"nudity,female masturbation,prom,female frontal nudity,sex comedy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"American Pie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1622540569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA4MjI3MjItOGIxNy00MzcxLWJiNWQtZWQ4MzA5ZGIyYTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA4MjI3MjItOGIxNy00MzcxLWJiNWQtZWQ4MzA5ZGIyYTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004755/","name":"Jason Biggs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005098/","name":"Chris Klein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005272/","name":"Thomas Ian Nicholas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919369/","name":"Paul Weitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919363/","name":"Chris Weitz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0100462/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082027/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381221/","name":"Adam Herz"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flight
Lot
Flight
programme.desc: Flight: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Nadine Velazquez, Denzel Washington, Carter Cabassa, Adam C. Edwards. An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1907668/","name":"Flight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMjI1OTMxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc3NTY1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1907668/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EmmaDinkins"},"dateCreated":"2012-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Chix Chat on Film Review: Prepare for take off!","reviewBody":"Flight is the story of a commercial pilot Whip Whitaker (Denzel Washington) who is able to land a defective plane with extraordinary skill, maneuvering it into an inverted position in order to slow the decent. We see this inverted flight captured in the trailer, but believe it or not this is not the most provocative element of this film. The story is so thought provoking that it will have you walking out of the theater questioning whether or not you could or would choose nobility over self-preservation. Most of what takes place behind the scenes looming like a predator waiting to strike is the blame game, with Whip continuously asserting that no one could have landed that plane except him. That point is supported but it's the collateral damage of his arrogance that is at the forefront of determining liability. The trailer also lets the audience in on the fact that Whip is found to have alcohol in his system as is discussed with Hugh Lang (Don Cheadle) who is the attorney brought in to defend Whip on behalf of the Pilot's association. Hugh was very straight and very narrow, which was the case with most of the characters aside from Whip. It was the dichotomy of Whip's persona so brilliantly conveyed in his mannerisms, responses, and facial expressions that makes the performance Oscar, Golden Globe, BET, Trumpet, Image, MTV and any other awards worthy. If Mr. Washington had uttered eight bars I would say he deserves a Hip Hop award or a Grammy, he was that convincing. I recognized this person that Mr. Washington portrayed so true to life, which is not just a testament to good writing, but mostly to the phenomenal acting talent that is Denzel. All the characteristics that made this individual a hero were the same characteristics that could potentially make him infamous. I will say that I as well as many fans am always open to greater insight into who Denzel is, however the rear view was totally unnecessary. The film does a great job of telling a story about the human condition, nobody is one dimensional and sometimes extreme circumstances make you write yourself a reality check. The question is when you cash that check will you be happy with the results. If you have any fear of flying this is not the movie for you. It will reinforce that fear and possibly cause you to swear off flying altogether. I give this film a green light.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":337404,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-12-12","keywords":"stewardess,pilot,airplane crash,airplane pilot,flight attendant","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2384176153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0NjAzNTMzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTQ2MTA2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0NjAzNTMzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTQ2MTA2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An airline pilot saves a flight from crashing, but an investigation into the malfunctions reveals something troubling. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1229204/","name":"Nadine Velazquez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000332/","name":"Don Cheadle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0309691/","name":"John Gatins"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1907668, Title: Flight, --- Description: Flight: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Nadine Velazquez, Denzel Washington, Carter Cabassa, Adam C. Edwards. An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1907668/","name":"Flight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMjI1OTMxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc3NTY1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1907668/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"EmmaDinkins","dateCreated":"2012-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Chix Chat on Film Review: Prepare for take off!","reviewBody":"Flight is the story of a commercial pilot Whip Whitaker (Denzel Washington) who is able to land a defective plane with extraordinary skill, maneuvering it into an inverted position in order to slow the decent. We see this inverted flight captured in the trailer, but believe it or not this is not the most provocative element of this film. The story is so thought provoking that it will have you walking out of the theater questioning whether or not you could or would choose nobility over self-preservation. Most of what takes place behind the scenes looming like a predator waiting to strike is the blame game, with Whip continuously asserting that no one could have landed that plane except him. That point is supported but it's the collateral damage of his arrogance that is at the forefront of determining liability. The trailer also lets the audience in on the fact that Whip is found to have alcohol in his system as is discussed with Hugh Lang (Don Cheadle) who is the attorney brought in to defend Whip on behalf of the Pilot's association. Hugh was very straight and very narrow, which was the case with most of the characters aside from Whip. It was the dichotomy of Whip's persona so brilliantly conveyed in his mannerisms, responses, and facial expressions that makes the performance Oscar, Golden Globe, BET, Trumpet, Image, MTV and any other awards worthy. If Mr. Washington had uttered eight bars I would say he deserves a Hip Hop award or a Grammy, he was that convincing. I recognized this person that Mr. Washington portrayed so true to life, which is not just a testament to good writing, but mostly to the phenomenal acting talent that is Denzel. All the characteristics that made this individual a hero were the same characteristics that could potentially make him infamous. I will say that I as well as many fans am always open to greater insight into who Denzel is, however the rear view was totally unnecessary. The film does a great job of telling a story about the human condition, nobody is one dimensional and sometimes extreme circumstances make you write yourself a reality check. The question is when you cash that check will you be happy with the results. If you have any fear of flying this is not the movie for you. It will reinforce that fear and possibly cause you to swear off flying altogether. I give this film a green light.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":337404,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-12-12","keywords":"stewardess,pilot,airplane crash,airplane pilot,flight attendant","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2384176153","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0NjAzNTMzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTQ2MTA2OA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0NjAzNTMzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTQ2MTA2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An airline pilot saves a flight from crashing, but an investigation into the malfunctions reveals something troubling. ","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1229204/","name":"Nadine Velazquez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000332/","name":"Don Cheadle"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0309691/","name":"John Gatins"],"duration":"PT2H18M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Królestwo niebieskie
Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc:
Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Duk"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"excellent, fair to islam, sweeping, narrative could have used tightening...","reviewBody":"I really enjoyed this movie. The way the movie started in Europe and how dark it was there... and the journey to Jerusalem... just wonderful stuff up to that point.

Liam Neeson, as usual, is just SO GOOD, you wish he had more screen time.


* Orlando Bloom, actually surprisingly, was able to carry the movie as a lead. I was surprised he had the heft to do it, but I agree with the critic who said that the beard helped. He was a man, not a boy.



* Battle scenes... incredible. I was really surprised that they could wow me, since we've been numbed by the quality of battle scenes in so many previous movies, but they did a great job.



* Portrayal of the Muslims. EXTREMELY fair. In being "even-handed" to Christians and Muslims there, if anything, they emphasized the Christian fanatics (in the form of the Templars in particular, to simplify things) as being the "badguys" more than anyone else... (which is historically accurate to some degree, in my understanding). I was surprised and pleased that they tried to be accurate, and didn't try to emphasize some "BAD MUSLIMS" to make it "even".



* Movie is very secular in it's moralizing.


And it portrays Christianity particularly religious men, VERY badly (the Priest who steals the cross from Bloom's wife's corpse... the Bishop in Jerusalem who's ready to convert to Islam at the first sign of defeat... and who also wants to abandon the civilians... the knights templar...) I thought this got a tad gratuitous. There were really NO GOOD Christian FIGURES IN THE MOVIE. The only good purported Christians were basically acting Agnostic (Bloom, Neeson, etc.) The actual religious Christians were made out to be hypocrites.

Meanwhile Saladhudin was a man of honor.. but also somewhat moderate.


* Movie could definitely have a little more narrative focus and maybe have a little more of an emotional circle for Orlando Bloom character. The emotional arc is ALREADY complete fairly early in the movie (Bloom becomes a man of conscience)... and it's kind of boring since the character doesn't really move after that.


But the movie tackled a HUGE topic and tackled it fairly well. I just wish there was a better script to handle the compelling personal journey for Orlando Bloom (from widower, murderer seeking redemption, lost bastard son) that was PROMISED at the beginning.

It seems that as soon as he brings water to his father's old land, he's just about done his journey, and it turns into a simple historical battle movie. (but a darn good one)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":274954,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Welcome to Chechnya
Witamy w Czeczenii
Welcome to Chechnya
programme.desc: Welcome to Chechnya: Directed by David France. With Olga Baranova, David Isteev, Ramzan Kadyrov, Maxim Lapunov. A group of activists risk their lives fighting for LGBTQ+ rights in Chechnya." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11394200/","name":"Welcome to Chechnya","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTlkZTlkZDktMzBkNi00OTE1LTk1YjktZmM2NWU0MzkzZDAxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYzNTk1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of activists risk their lives fighting for LGBTQ+ rights in Chechnya.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11394200/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"russell-415-618666"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"More inspiring than disheartening","reviewBody":"I've read a bit about Chechnya and the brutality of its regime and recall the stories of its brutal crackdown against LGBT people {stories which rarely make the news now) so I was expecting this doco to be a hard slog. The makers were deft at taking us on the underground railway of the network which saves gay and lesbian people by sneaking them out of Chechnya. We see the best qualities of humanity in the folk who risk so much to help others from being persecuted for being who they are. I was worried there'd be too many descriptions of torture and bashings etc. but they were just enough to give a sense of the horrors being committed. It was disheartening to hear how the people doing good are finding it harder to get asylum for the threatened. It's ad if the world is turning a blind eye. The film presents a forceful argument that persecution of a group in society is an ever present threat when leaders have impunity to express their dictatorial side: looking at you Putin and Trump.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2469,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2020-06-30","keywords":"chechnya,gay,lesbian,persecution of homosexuals,refugee","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11400807/","name":"Olga Baranova"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11400806/","name":"David Isteev"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2567375/","name":"Ramzan Kadyrov"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289800/","name":"David France"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382378/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0364681/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289800/","name":"David France"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2398815/","name":"Tyler H. Walk"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3960412/","name":"Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxMzk2ODI4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgzNzQ5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3960412/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aaronillustratornh"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Different Comedy Experience","reviewBody":"The movie was set up with a familiar plot that shouldn't really blow anyone out of the water. it also had a unique reality TV type way of shooting the film, but this movie is really meant for one thing. The off the wall humor. However the problems with the film shouldn't discourage people who want laughs! The movie had quite a bit of off the wall humor. Although the movie doesn't have you busting your gut through the entire showing it has it's moments. So if you like The Lonely Island, or Andy Sandberg's humor, go see the movie! In addition I will say I found the music in the film quite entertaining. The "So Humble" song that's at the beginning of the movie and in the trailers is still stuck in my head, and I don't mind.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":58055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Music"],"datePublished":"2016-06-03","keywords":"pop star,scene during end credits,repetition in title,concert,mockumentary","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2277946393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzA4MTIzNzReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU1Mzc0OTgx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzA4MTIzNzReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU1Mzc0OTgx._V1_.jpg","description":"When his new album fails to sell records, pop/rap superstar conner4real goes into a major tailspin and watches his celebrity high life begin to collapse. Although the movie doesn't have you busting your gut through the entire showing it has it's moments. So if you like The Lonely Island, or Andy Sandberg's humor, go see the movie! The story of two men, educators of children and adolescents with autism." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8655470/","name":"Hors normes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzODgxOTktODllNi00ZDA5LWI3YjktYTk0MWIwOGZlYmIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of two men, educators of children and adolescents with autism.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8655470/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vinsond21"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"I wish everyone gets to see this special movie","reviewBody":"It is a shame that a meaningful film like this one is not promoted to get more people to watch it, because it contains many hard truths that need to be told, but at least the filmmakers don't ram the message down the viewer's throat the way some movies do. programme.title: Dan in Real Life
Ja cię kocham, a ty z nim
Dan in Real Life
programme.desc:
Dan in Real Life: Directed by Peter Hedges. With Steve Carell, Juliette Binoche, Dane Cook, Alison Pill. A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0480242/","name":"Dan in Real Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2Nzc1NzQ1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTE0MDE1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0480242/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"seawalker"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not massively original, but it is entertaining","reviewBody":"Steve Carell plays Dan Burns, newspaper agony uncle and dedicated single father to three girls. At a large family homecoming Dan meets his perfect woman, only to find out that she is in a relationship with his brother.

What's a man to do?

I rather liked "Dan In Real Life", but I would imagine the success or otherwise of this flick is going to be down to whether you are willing to accept Steve Carell playing a part relatively straight and restrained, rather than going through the broad comedy moves that have made him so successful. If you cannot accept it, fear not, "Get Smart" will be along later in the year, but for the record I thought he was very good.

"Dan In Real Life" starts off like your typical, incidentally amusing, family drama, but it gets funnier and funnier as it goes along and Carell's frustration with his situation grows. It's not massively original (but if you only saw movies with original ideas, cinematic pickings would be very scarce indeed, wouldn't they?), but "Dan In Real Life" is entertaining, and a good cast (who wouldn't fall in love at first sight with the luminous Juliette Binoche?) make the most of an insightful enough script that contains many a ponder on the meaning and passion of love.

I hope that Steve Carell pushes himself and does something as interesting again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":99884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-10-26","keywords":"teenage girl,game,young girl,gymnasium,new york city","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dan in Real Life","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi414318873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDExMTA1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzA4ODM4._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDExMTA1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzA4ODM4._V1_.jpg","description":"Dan in Real Life trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176981/","name":"Dane Cook"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373282/","name":"Peter Hedges"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0168855/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307070/","name":"Pierce Gardner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373282/","name":"Peter Hedges"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

Romance, friendship and a villain’s evil plot…Hold onto your culottes, BARB & STAR debuts in your home on February 12th!","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325419/","name":"Kristen Wiig","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1754239/","name":"Annie Mumolo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1946193/","name":"Jamie Dornan"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2307949/","name":"Josh Greenbaum"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0471026/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0310184/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1754239/","name":"Annie Mumolo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325419/","name":"Kristen Wiig"],"duration":"PT1H47M"</script><metacontent="
